Our goal is to raise $15,000. We have already received a $30,000 commitment from government sources. It's now time for the community of cricket lovers, players, supporters and friends to join together and raise $15,000 for the final piece of the puzzle. Help to make this dream a reality. Donate today, and be a part of raising funds for this vital community facility. Your donation will go to the construction and ongoing maintenance of the DCI Cricket Practice Facility.1500 WICKETSIn cricket, getting a wicket is the equivalent of a strike out in baseball. For every $10 donation, we'll add a wicket to our total.  When we've collected 1500 wickets, we will have reached our fundraising goal of $15,000. All money raised will go direct to the Trust Fund for the construction and ongoing maintenance of a facility.1 wicket = $ 105 wickets = $ 5010 wickets = $ 100Buy any amount of wickets in multiples of $10WHERE WILL WE BUILD IT?As with any permanent sporting facility, initial funds will be required to purchase materials, dig the 8' w x 60’ l x 12'' d surface (x2) and labour to lay the surfaces and install required fencing. The Facility will be located at Dakota Collegiate Institute 661 Dakota Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba in the grassed schoolyard adjacent to the Beliveau Avenue fencing on the Northeast field. The area to be fenced would be adjacent to the existing East Parking lot.WHENWe propose to build in May/June 2014 - Opening in July 2014.MANITOBA CRICKET FACTS
The first known cricket was played in Manitoba in 1847 at Lower Fort Garry.
The Manitoba Cricket Association was established in 1937.
1967 Pan-Am Games reformed the Assiniboine Park pitches for Senior League
2011 - Assiniboine Park Conservancy improves Assin. Park Facility
In 2013 the Winnipeg Senior League  registered 19 senior teams, setting a league record.

story:
Hello and thanks for visiting this page! I have been given the opportunity become a leader for Mission 1:11 and need your help to make this calling God has placed on my life a reality! If I successfully raise the needed funds, I will take part in a special leadership training missions trip to Ethiopia this spring, and will then be ready to lead teams of students into other countries like Indonesia in the future. Help me fulfill the great commision that our Lord has called us to complete!

THE TRIP

A trip to Ethiopia can be a pretty big commitment. After several weeks of training stateside, we depart to the capital city of Ethiopia, Addis Ababa. 

Once we arrive we travel for a few days to a village in a new part of the country that hasn't yet been crusaded. This first two weeks of the trip we dedicate to a massive evangelical crusade, where anywhere from 20,000-200,000 people are estimated to attend. People from all the surrounding areas will walk for miles, carrying their sick and disabled family members to the crusade sight believing that God will show up and perform miraculous signs. People receive Christ by the thousands during this weeklong festival. 

The second half of the trip is where we go to an unreached tribal group. These are the people you see in National Geographic, isolated by land barriers in regions that can't be travelled to except via helicopter. We fly in with our equipment and land in their village. We stay and live with them for three weeks, presenting the gospel in a series of stories that they can understand by their oral traditions. We eat with them, bathe with them, laugh with them, share stories, and almost become part of the tribe ourselves. Lives are truly changed forever, both theirs and ours.

The expenses for the trip include everything we will need in country: food, airfare, transportation once we arrive, tents, all our camping equipment, walter filtration devices, etc. Any amount helps and is truly a blessing. We need all the help we can get! 

THE RISKS

The risks involved are many, but we count them all as blessings for the gospel! When in a foreign country, anything can go wrong. But we have all trust in God that this is His will and that He will be with us every step of the way.

story:
Hallo , ich bin 27 Jahre alt und arbeite seit geraumer Zeit mit blinden Kindern.

Da es mir unvorstellbar ist warum Artikel für Blinde so teuer sind ( Die kleine Raupe Nimmersatt kostet 300 Euro in Punktschrift) würde ich gerne

Eltern blinder Kinder unterstützen und Ihnen einige Bücher auf Braille schreiben.

Außerdem würde ich gerne Tassen , Schmuck etc. mit Braille beschriften..

Es gibt viel zu wenig Dinge mit Brailleschrift.. oder aber sie sind so teuer das

es sich normalverdiener nicht leisten können. Warum sollen Familien

blinder Angehöriger bestraft werden ????

Um dieses Allerdings umzusetzen brauche ich etwas Unterstützung....

Ich würde mich sehr freuen :)

*************************************************************************

Hello, I am 27 years old and have been working for some time with blind children.

Since it is inconceivable to me why products are so expensive for the Blind (The Very Hungry Caterpillar costs 300 euros in braille) I would like to

Parents of blind children and help you write some books in Braille.

I would also like mugs, ornaments, etc. with Braille lettering ..

There is far too little .. things with Braille or they are so expensive that

it is normal earners can not afford. Why should families

blind supporter punished ????

To implement this, however, I need some support ....

I would be very happy :)

Why should families blind supporter punished ???? To implement this, however, I need some support .... I would be very happy :)

story:
Please help support a home for rural Indian children in need

because every child deserves to be cared for!

Hello there friends,
We are trying to raise funds for a charity (RAYS) run by Devika's family, which runs orphanages for rural Indian children who were born HIV+ and subsequently developed AIDS. Many of these children lost their parents or were abandoned by relatives who were unwilling or unable to care for them. RAYS gives them a home, cares for their needs and education, and counsels them towards a life of possibility and optimism.


RAYS, which was founded in Jaipur four years ago, now cares for 50 children who are HIV+ and employs 10 care-takers who also suffer from AIDS. 
Caring for children with AIDS is a great responsibility and as a charitable organization RAYS relies on donations and fundraising campaigns to meet the annual needs of these children.
We have seen these children grow over the last few years and if you'd ever meet them for the first time, you would'nt even realize that they are terminally ill. Their spirit and optimism amazes us and inspires us. We'd like to help ensure that they get the attention and treatments that they deserve.

We are trying to raise 2000 US dollars for RAYS this year. The funds will be directed to the organization. Even if we do not succeed in reaching our target amount, RAYS will benefit from whatever funds we raise.


You can find out more about the children at a website we've made for this project:
http://dnarain.wix.com/rays-ngo
Here is RAYS's official website: http://www.ngoraysjaipur.org/
RAYS is also on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RAYSNGO?ref=br_tf

Thank you for your support!

Yours truly,
Devika and Guus

story:
My name is Mette Christensen.  I was born and raised in Norway.  In 1997 I had an experience  of " awakening" where I was in direct communion with God and  through that experience it was revealed to me how I could achieve my desire of  peace.  Since then I have journeyed the path less traveled and during my journey I shared with people my own experiences.  I was so fortunate to witness first hand how those stories changed peoples lives for the better. This has been my passion for the last 17 years. Please watch my video of that encounter to grasp the magnitude of my mission which you will actually be joining by contributing so that I can bring the message out to the world. I also invite you to go to my website www.mettesjourneyhome.com to view 2 other videos where i share about my experience with forgiveness and how we trap and inherit emotions from our parents. The old world of separation is collapsing and humanity are going through a gigantic transitioning which will lead into unity.  It is time to throw off the chains of pain and suffering and live life in joy and love which our soul is yearning to express.    

My goal is to raise $20,000.00 or more to hire an expert in marketing my book and to set up speaking engagements all over the world for me to bring my message out to as many people as possible and that are ready to hear it.  I am so exited that Wasabi Publicity., Inc. has agreed to take me on as a client.  Their website is: www.wasabipublicity.com . They have been in this business for 10 years  and have launched many well known people. Whatever funds are raised will go to pay for the marketing and PR campaign plus help with traveling expenses.  For helping me achieving my goal  please look at all the perks that you receive and you will  have my deep gratitude for backing me in this endevore. 

We are in the midst of this gigantic transitioning right now and so many people feel lost and have no idea why their world is falling apart. It is vitally important for my message to get out! What could be a more exiting, fulfilling and rewarding experience  for you than knowing that you have been part of changing history and been in service to humanity in this way? It takes team work to get this done!

Your help is so much appreciated.  No body can do this alone.  As the saying goes:  It takes a village to raise a child.  I am just a messenger but you are the wind beneath my wings.  Without you I can not fly. If you just feel called to pass this along that is just as important as monetary donation and equally appreciated. From the bottom of my heart I thank each and every one of you for sharing your heart  by  your donation.

story:
Here in the Yorkshire & Humber region we would like to give every voter the opportunity to vote for a Green Party MP. In order for us to stand candidates we need to raise a deposit1 of £500 for each one. As you can imagine, with 54 parliamentary seats in our region alone, this is quite a substantial sum for our party to raise.

You may be aware that the larger parties often take large donations from big business interests, but the Green Party are not funded in that way. Our campaigns are powered by party members and supporters like you.

Please help us support your local parliamentary candidate by giving what you can. With donations starting at just £1 we hope everyone can get involved. Please note: if you decide to donate more than £50 we will need to take some additional details2 from you before we can accept your kind offer of support.

Should we fail to raise the required £500 deposit for this constituency we would try to transfer funds from better funded areas. This will be a reciprocal arrangement so if this campaign is over funded our team will try to support as may other local candidates as possible. After funding deposits across the region, any remaining funds will be returned to the originating constituency, to support their campaigning efforts.

If you feel you are not able to contribute financially, you can still help by telling your friends and family, sharing our page (www.yorkshiregreen2015.com) on social media and following the campaign on Facebook and Twitter (links below) to stay up to date with progress. You can also volunteer to help the Green Party campaign by signing up here http://greenparty.org.uk/getinvolved/

Finally, of course, don’t forget that your vote counts on May 7th!

Many thanks for your helping in turning Yorkshire and Humber Green in 2015.

1Candidate deposits have been required since the 1985 general election

2For donations over £50 we are legally obligated to take a record of the donor's name and address and to also confirm the donor is on the UK electoral register.

Promoted by Bluebell Eikonoklastes on behalf of the Yorkshire and the Humber Region Green Party Parliamentary election candidate list both at Flat B, 77 Grange Avenue, Chapeltown, LEEDS, LS7 4EN.

story:
"Hopeful, inspiring, challenging, heart-wrenching, nail-biting, and fun!"

The Roots of Resistance is here . . . and you can join in the fun of the Community Publishing Campaign to launch this novel into the world! Be the first to read the book! Pick up copies for friends! Support Rivera Sun and connect this novel to people far and wide.

"They came like a tidal wave of love, riding the demand for justice
that swelled into the flash flood of the movement."
- From The Roots of Resistance

All of your favorite characters from The Dandelion Insurrection are back! Charlie Rider and Zadie Byrd Gray may have won a revolution, but "they've got more problems than centipedes have legs" - as lawyer Tansy Beaulisle puts it. The new president can't be trusted. The rich and powerful refuse to step down. A mysterious group called the Roots slips a violent edge into the heart of the movement. When the media cooks up a love affair between Zadie and the Roots' leader, it takes every ounce of Charlie's courage and compassion to keep the Dandelion Insurrection moving forward.

You're in for a wild adventure as the indomitable dandelions rise to the challenge of intrigues, deception, love triangles, and sabotage with the passion and bold action that will leave you cheering for more!
 


Get a copy for you. Buy books for friends.
Celebrate with the Holiday Special! 
Get a great deal and get ten books at once.
Support Rivera's health and a whole year's worth of writing.
This year, your support is appreciated more than ever! With your generosity, Rivera Sun can: 

  • Launch The Roots of Resistance far and wide, connect thousands of readers to the novel, and get the message out through all forms of media!
  • In the coming months, release a series of never-before-seen manuscripts like Rebel Song, and Hope At The End of The World.
  • Write, write, write . . . it's an incredible year for writing. See below for more on what's coming!
  • And, perhaps most importantly, fully heal from cancer and leap back into life with the enthusiasm and vision you know and love. Thank you!

Thank you for your generosity and care!​

"It takes everyone to bring a world of respect, justice, kindness, and courage into existence."
- From The Roots of Resistance by Rivera Sun

We've published novels through these Community Publishing Campaigns for four years together. Each year, we work together to launch the new book.
This year, the vision is bigger and bolder: launch the book AND help fund the exciting new projects coming in 2018. 

That's why we have a big "ask" this year! Because it's a BIG year! For the first time ever, Rivera Sun has the opportunity to be a full-time writer, focusing on the stories you love and the essays, books, and novels we need in the world. She has exciting projects lined up for 2018, and your support makes them possible. Rivera Sun is a Community Supported Writer whose books are published by people like you through Community Publishing Campaigns. For the first time ever, you have a chance to support the newest release AND a whole set of interesting projects that are coming.

Here's a sneak peek at what's in the works:

Rebel Song: a one-of-a-kind epic poem crossed with a rallying cry for our hearts, coming in a print book . . . and an audio book! (Yes!!! We've all been asking Rivera to do audio books for years!)

Hope at the End of the World: a girl named Hope sets out to change the world in a mythic parable for our times that will make you laugh, cry with joy, and fall in love with the world once again.

Essays of the Man From the North: the popular essays of Charlie Rider, expanded and compiled into a rabble-rousing, inspiring volume.

Roots of Resistance Study Guide to Nonviolent Action: Did you know that half the people who pick up The Dandelion Insurrection also get the study guide? We're working on a second study guide to expand upon the exciting pearls of strategy and history woven into The Roots of Resistance. An invaluable resource!

Sequel to The Way Between: Also on Rivera Sun's writing desk is the second in the Ari Ara Series ... we have kids across the country waiting for this book. Not to mention the young-at-heart fans who love "the pluckiest red-head since Little Orphan Annie".

And more ... as you know, Rivera Sun writes like there's no tomorrow. Now that she's back-in-action and rebounding from cancer, she'll be bending her mighty pen to essays for our times, crafting articles for over 100 journals nationwide. Your support helps her do this. Thank you.

"Love thrusts the world through eternity and carries us forward into the infinity of tomorrow. With love, the pivot of change emerges, and we find the lever that is long enough to move the world. With love, the arc of the universe bends toward justice, the spirit of humanity soars, and the flood of life revives."
​- From The Roots of Resistance

Greetings, everyone! Like you, I'm dancing with excitement as we bring The Roots of Resistance into the world. Be bold. Be generous. I appreciate your support - especially this year. As you can imagine, writing this novel while healing from cancer has been a challenge and an adventure. I am deeply grateful for every breath of life, and for the chance to write these stories. Your support is what makes all of this possible. I am a community supported writer, and my work happens because of people like you. So, be bold and generous in your support of this Community Publishing Campaign!

With your help, we can bring this book - and many others - into existence, offering stories of hope and courage for people's hearts as we work for change. We live in a time of unparalleled challenges. We need stories like this to uplift our hearts and inspire creative action.

Be sure to tell all your friends to get The Roots of Resistance NOW . . . the First Edition won't be here until the spring, so this is everyone's chance to read it before then. (And I know you're all itching to read it as soon as possible!)

Thank you in advance for your generosity. Your love and support move my heart profoundly. I am honored to be a part of the work we are all doing together to create of world of peace, justice, respect, and love. Thank you for being a part of this journey!

In gratitude, Rivera Sun

Like this idea?  Share it on Facebook and Twitter. 
Friends love being involved in uplifting,
change-the-world projects . . . don't leave them out of the fun!

Excerpt from "The Roots of Resistance"

Behind the curtains of the star-strewn sky, just beyond the edge of ordinary sight, Love churned as vast as plate tectonics and as powerful as thunderstorms. It pressed against the edges of reality, seeking to crack the barriers of awareness that blocked it. Zadie recognized this Great Love - the kind that sears the soul and hauls us back from human folly, the Love reverberating in revolutions of the heart, the Love that scorches cruelty away as it rises, the Love that breaks our hearts and turns out its contents to those in need.

Life wants to live, but more that that, it wants to love. Simple survival is not enough. Mere procreation leaves mothers turning their faces to the wall and fathers hanging from the rafters. Fallen in the wasteland, thirst alone may leave us collapsed, abandoning our bodies to the vultures. But love? For the hope of saving our children, seeing our beloved, or protecting our communities, we stagger to our feet and stumble forward on the burning sand. To save her granddaughter, an elderly woman can find the strength to lift a crushing vehicle. For his father, a son plunges into the flames of a burning house. We shoulder the unbearable, accomplish the impossible, endure the unthinkable by the intensity of our love.

These stories of love emerge on every continent, in every town. Multiplied by millions, they create a song of life louder than the small-hearted survivalists, richer than the death mongers and their addictions. More enduring than despair, more grounded than hope, this song reverberates in the genetic strands of humanity, woven into the biological structure of human life. Deep in history, our foremothers loved their children. Far in the future, our descendants love their families. In this present moment, which hangs like a bead of dew on the grass stem of time, where the life of the planet lies clouded by question marks and the body of humanity lies massive and sprawled in a wasteland of our own making, the love song of our ancestors and descendants is calling to us to rise. The hymn of life hums in the throats of our brothers and sisters. The chords of evolution roar and bark, howl and hiss, warble and moan from the tongues of fellow animals. The wind strikes the harp strings of the forests and marshes, prairies and mountains. The great tympani of the coasts booms and crashes across the cymbals of sands and the drum barrels of rocks.

All that is needed is to listen. The love song of the world enters our souls through the language of life. Our touchstone of strength forms the shape of our beloveds. Courage surges into our limbs. We rise. One foot steps in the direction of change. This is the Love that thrusts the world through eternity and carries us forward into the infinity of tomorrow. It sings overhead, scouring the barriers of reality, looking for an opening.

Thank you for your generous and loving support! You are amazing!

"They were leaderful, colorful, creative, and unruly,
hard to control, impossible to stop.
It was madness. It was glorious. It was the Dandelion Insurrection."
- From The Roots of Resistance

Support the Community Publishing Campaign:
Get a book (or two, or ten),
then SHARE on social media so friends far and wide
also have this chance to be a part of the fun!
Thank you.

When the media cooks up a love affair between Zadie and the Roots' leader, it takes every ounce of Charlie's courage and compassion to keep the Dandelion Insurrection moving forward.
You're in for a wild adventure as the indomitable dandelions rise to the challenge of intrigues, deception, love triangles, and sabotage with the passion and bold action that will leave you cheering for more! 


Get a copy for you. Buy books for friends.Celebrate with the Holiday Special! Get a great deal and get ten books at once. Support Rivera's health and a whole year's worth of writing. This year, your support is appreciated more than ever! With your generosity, Rivera Sun can: 

Launch The Roots of Resistance far and wide, connect thousands of readers to the novel, and get the message out through all forms of media!
In the coming months, release a series of never-before-seen manuscripts like Rebel Song, and Hope At The End of The World.

Write, write, write . . . it's an incredible year for writing. See below for more on what's coming!
And, perhaps most importantly, fully heal from cancer and leap back into life with the enthusiasm and vision you know and love. Thank you!


Thank you for your generosity and care!​
"It takes everyone to bring a world of respect, justice, kindness, and courage into existence."- From The Roots of Resistance by Rivera Sun

We've published novels through these Community Publishing Campaigns for four years together. Each year, we work together to launch the new book.This year, the vision is bigger and bolder: launch the book AND help fund the exciting new projects coming in 2018. 
That's why we have a big "ask" this year! Because it's a BIG year! For the first time ever, Rivera Sun has the opportunity to be a full-time writer, focusing on the stories you love and the essays, books, and novels we need in the world. She has exciting projects lined up for 2018, and your support makes them possible. Rivera Sun is a Community Supported Writer whose books are published by people like you through Community Publishing Campaigns. For the first time ever, you have a chance to support the newest release AND a whole set of interesting projects that are coming.
Here's a sneak peek at what's in the works:
Rebel Song: a one-of-a-kind epic poem crossed with a rallying cry for our hearts, coming in a print book . . . and an audio book! (Yes!!! We've all been asking Rivera to do audio books for years!)
Hope at the End of the World: a girl named Hope sets out to change the world in a mythic parable for our times that will make you laugh, cry with joy, and fall in love with the world once again.
Essays of the Man From the North: the popular essays of Charlie Rider, expanded and compiled into a rabble-rousing, inspiring volume.
Roots of Resistance Study Guide to Nonviolent Action: Did you know that half the people who pick up The Dandelion Insurrection also get the study guide? We're working on a second study guide to expand upon the exciting pearls of strategy and history woven into The Roots of Resistance. An invaluable resource!
Sequel to The Way Between: Also on Rivera Sun's writing desk is the second in the Ari Ara Series ... we have kids across the country waiting for this book. Not to mention the young-at-heart fans who love "the pluckiest red-head since Little Orphan Annie".
And more ... as you know, Rivera Sun writes like there's no tomorrow. Now that she's back-in-action and rebounding from cancer, she'll be bending her mighty pen to essays for our times, crafting articles for over 100 journals nationwide. Your support helps her do this. Thank you.
"Love thrusts the world through eternity and carries us forward into the infinity of tomorrow. With love, the pivot of change emerges, and we find the lever that is long enough to move the world. With love, the arc of the universe bends toward justice, the spirit of humanity soars, and the flood of life revives."​- From The Roots of Resistance

Greetings, everyone! Like you, I'm dancing with excitement as we bring The Roots of Resistance into the world. Be bold. Be generous. I appreciate your support - especially this year. As you can imagine, writing this novel while healing from cancer has been a challenge and an adventure. I am deeply grateful for every breath of life, and for the chance to write these stories. Your support is what makes all of this possible. I am a community supported writer, and my work happens because of people like you. So, be bold and generous in your support of this Community Publishing Campaign!
With your help, we can bring this book - and many others - into existence, offering stories of hope and courage for people's hearts as we work for change. We live in a time of unparalleled challenges. We need stories like this to uplift our hearts and inspire creative action.
Be sure to tell all your friends to get The Roots of Resistance NOW . . . the First Edition won't be here until the spring, so this is everyone's chance to read it before then. (And I know you're all itching to read it as soon as possible!)
Thank you in advance for your generosity. Your love and support move my heart profoundly. I am honored to be a part of the work we are all doing together to create of world of peace, justice, respect, and love. Thank you for being a part of this journey!
In gratitude, Rivera Sun

Like this idea?  Share it on Facebook and Twitter. Friends love being involved in uplifting,change-the-world projects . . . don't leave them out of the fun!

Excerpt from "The Roots of Resistance"
Behind the curtains of the star-strewn sky, just beyond the edge of ordinary sight, Love churned as vast as plate tectonics and as powerful as thunderstorms. It pressed against the edges of reality, seeking to crack the barriers of awareness that blocked it. Zadie recognized this Great Love - the kind that sears the soul and hauls us back from human folly, the Love reverberating in revolutions of the heart, the Love that scorches cruelty away as it rises, the Love that breaks our hearts and turns out its contents to those in need.
Life wants to live, but more that that, it wants to love. Simple survival is not enough. Mere procreation leaves mothers turning their faces to the wall and fathers hanging from the rafters. Fallen in the wasteland, thirst alone may leave us collapsed, abandoning our bodies to the vultures. But love? For the hope of saving our children, seeing our beloved, or protecting our communities, we stagger to our feet and stumble forward on the burning sand. To save her granddaughter, an elderly woman can find the strength to lift a crushing vehicle. For his father, a son plunges into the flames of a burning house. We shoulder the unbearable, accomplish the impossible, endure the unthinkable by the intensity of our love.
These stories of love emerge on every continent, in every town. Multiplied by millions, they create a song of life louder than the small-hearted survivalists, richer than the death mongers and their addictions. More enduring than despair, more grounded than hope, this song reverberates in the genetic strands of humanity, woven into the biological structure of human life. Deep in history, our foremothers loved their children. Far in the future, our descendants love their families. In this present moment, which hangs like a bead of dew on the grass stem of time, where the life of the planet lies clouded by question marks and the body of humanity lies massive and sprawled in a wasteland of our own making, the love song of our ancestors and descendants is calling to us to rise. The hymn of life hums in the throats of our brothers and sisters. The chords of evolution roar and bark, howl and hiss, warble and moan from the tongues of fellow animals. The wind strikes the harp strings of the forests and marshes, prairies and mountains. The great tympani of the coasts booms and crashes across the cymbals of sands and the drum barrels of rocks.
All that is needed is to listen. The love song of the world enters our souls through the language of life. Our touchstone of strength forms the shape of our beloveds. Courage surges into our limbs. We rise. One foot steps in the direction of change. This is the Love that thrusts the world through eternity and carries us forward into the infinity of tomorrow. It sings overhead, scouring the barriers of reality, looking for an opening.
Thank you for your generous and loving support! You are amazing!
"They were leaderful, colorful, creative, and unruly,hard to control, impossible to stop.It was madness. It was glorious. It was the Dandelion Insurrection."- From The Roots of Resistance
Support the Community Publishing Campaign:Get a book (or two, or ten),then SHARE on social media so friends far and widealso have this chance to be a part of the fun!Thank you.

story:
Short Summary

Claudia lives in a very small town in Southern Italy where the cobblestone streets are so narrow you can’t even have a car, not that there is any money for one. There’s no money, no food and barely any education. All around her is poverty and death and nothing to do but marry a local boy and start a family of her own. But she has a feeling that there’s more for her out in the world. One fateful visit from a distant relative and suddenly she knows what she needs to do. Despite all the obstacles she knows she has to face, she sets out on a very difficult and unknown journey that challenges her every step of the way. A journey that will either be the best thing she’s ever done or the biggest mistake of her life.

                        ________________________________________________

You will love this book if you like historical fiction, have any interest in Italian lifestyle, enjoy reading stories about strong women who change their lives, or are an immigrant or child of an immigrant. Beyond the Cobblestones speaks to women and immigrants who want to grapple with lack of opportunity and lack of education in a bold way.

My hope is that you will discover that having dreams and fighting to realize those dreams are what makes for an exciting life. I want you to see this book as an opportunity to break away from limitations and make big changes in your life. To learn that perseverance can really pay off.

Ultimately, I hope that Beyond the Cobblestones inspires reflection and fruitful dialogue, pressing into engaging questions like:

  • What do I want to achieve in my life and where do I begin?
  • How can I make life better for my family and others who are important to me?
  • How can I show others that they are not bound by how their life began?

I look forward to exploring these questions and beyond with my readers. I believe discussing the idea of fighting for you dreams, and persevering through obstacles will change us all for the better.

 

About the Author

Luisa Ramondo, affectionately known for her Italian heritage and nurturing traits, makes her literary debut with "Beyond the Cobblestones," a passion project that's been in the works for years. Inspired by tales of her mother's journey from the villages of Italy to the bustling cities of America.

She is an award-winning real estate agent who lives in the Philadelphia area with her husband and three sons. When she's not writing or selling houses, Luisa can be found on the tennis courts, in a spin class, on a yoga mat, or in the kitchen.

Luisa is known for her natural cooking abilities and effortless entertaining skills. Scents of tomato and basil waft through her welcoming home as she regularly delights her friends and family with Sunday dinners - experiences she's carried from her own youth that have inspired this lively tale.        

For more information, you can connect with Luisa Livorno Ramondo at LuisaLRamondo@gmail.com and at https://www.facebook.com/Luisa-Livorno-Ramondo-Writer-100393468576609 or https://www.instagram.com/ramondoluisa/

 

What We Need & What You Get

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in August, 2021.
  • The cover design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
  • The layout design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
  • The copy editing for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
  • The launch & promotion efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this End of Summer, 2021
     

When I pre-sell 120 copies of my book, I will publish a paperback and ebook. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish a hardcover edition. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover and an audiobook.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish.
  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book.
  • You will receive early access to the Author’s Note and other excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
  • And much more.

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please send me a private message.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by including the cost of mailing and shipping the signed copies into each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we ship the pre-order rewards to you as early as possible. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as to when my book will publish. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please share my pre-sale campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. Please use #BeyondtheCobblestones and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it via text or direct message on social media.

Thank you so much for of all of your love and support!

story:
Transdimensional philosophy, outsider literature, reality-recognising children’s books & radiant black comedy…

I am an author of non-fiction and fiction; mostly accessible philosophy, social criticism and outsider literature, but also love-stories, comedy and children’s books. My work has been endorsed by Terry Gilliam, John Zerzan, Chris Morris, John Pilger, Media Lens, Galen Strawson, Alain de Botton, Ran Prieur and many others. My last book, a radical guide to the entire system, 33 Myths of the System, has been downloaded well over 50,000 times, shared and discussed across the fringe internet.

I want to create beautiful physical objects — like my first book, The Apocalypedia, accidentally published by Green Books — but no publisher will take the risk. Some agents love my work, even some publishers, but ‘it won’t sell’. In fact no media company can now take the risk on truthful or original work, which is why there is so little of it today — when we need it most.

I am currently working on the follow-up to 33 Myths of the System  — Self and Unself — and my wife has started my graphic novel, Sam How: Rabbit. I also have two novels and two television scripts finished. To publish these and to finish what I am working on now will take time and money, neither of which I have or am likely to get.

These books all, in one way or another, directly address the reality of the world — and of human consciousness — as it actually is. There is nothing like what I am producing. These books have to appear, and soon, so I am asking for funding for a year of writing and publishing. I am asking for enough money to drastically cut down on the wage-labour I am currently engaged in, which is keeping me from doing what I should be doing, and to publish my books to the standard they deserve.

How Much I Need and What I Can Give in Return…

To cut down on paid work for a year, work on Self and Unself and Sam How, typeset and design them, and then get them — along with Drowning is Fine and 33 Myths of the System — printed, I need at least £12,000. If I don’t reach this goal, funds will go towards publishing what I have, as and when it is finished. If I somehow overshoot the funding target, I will publish more (my other novel, Dawn and various essays and stories, possibly the Spanish translation of 33 Myths that is now being finished off), my wife can take extra time on Sam How and if I overshoot by a long way I can create a publishing company, publish a few glorious beacons in these dark times, perhaps produce a couple of short films or a pilot for one of my shows.

In return for funding you’ll get, first of all, what George Harrison said he wanted to get from funding the Life of Brian — to see it. I will offer digital copies to people who donate £20 along with physical copies for higher donations. The highest donations will be recognised in the books themselves.

EDIT: As you can see, I have now, almost miraculously, achieved my goal, which guarantees what I have will be published and Self & Unself (and eventually Sam How) will be written. Praise the gods, I can grow some flowers in the desert, which I look forward, very much, to sharing with everyone as they bloom.

But Why…?

Those of you who have read The Apocalypedia (available here), Belly Up! (here) and my free book 33 Myths of the System (available here) will have a good idea of what I have to offer. If you are new to my work, please take a look at my website (here).

Here is a brief selection of quotes from readers.

  • I've been studying your blog and the Apocalypedia for the better part of a year now, and I'm constantly amazed at the clarity, but also poignancy and humor of your writing…
  • Your website is a gift to our times: I learned truths that have made me more alive, and reminded me of things that I’ve always known, but didn’t have the courage to act on…
  • I am absolutely fascinated with your book 33 Myths of The System. It has left my life in shambles…! 
  • Your writing has been revolutionary to me over the past few months. You have put into words so much of what I feel.
  • Through reading 33 Myths, and in conjunction with the various realities of my new situation, I found the wherewithal to make changes in my life over the last 12 months that I would have not dreamed of making in the years prior.
  • I recently basically read your entire website and laughed and cried (actually currently still crying).
  • After reading so many books, it’s hard not to feel you’re just reading the same things, said in different ways but really found this otherwise in your thought and understand of our current state of affairs and how we got here. Genuinely original, very uncommon!
  • I cried all the time while I was reading it. It also made me sick. As in actual diarrhea and nausea. While mentally it didn’t clash with me, my body reacted to it. I can’t wait to order it. 

Probably you won’t feel quite such wondrous joy at reading my stuff, but I’ve been looking into the moribund state of civilisation for three decades now; not just that, but, as far as possible, living as ‘if the day had come’. If you’re reading this, you’re probably starting to do the same, and you’re sure to find insights in my work which will strengthen your intuitions and convictions.

Alright, Why Now…?

I wouldn’t be asking for so much money to do all this for myself if, firstly, I hadn’t explored every other option, secondly, if I didn’t think that time was running short for humanity, thirdly if I weren’t skint and, fourthly, if I wasn’t stone cold certain that the world, or — no, not the world, of course not — that its most sensitive denizens need to hear what I have to say.

Here is a brief introduction to the books I have lined up:

Self & Unself

Self and Unself is a guide to reality and self, covering the breadth and plumbing the depth of human — and non-human — experience. It was originally conceived as the sister volume to 33 Myths of the System (originally titled 33 Myths of the Ego), the intention being to do for the illusions of the human mind what my previous book did for the human world, but it has since expanded into something richer and stranger.

Western philosophy has had nothing very meaningful to say since Schopenhauer died, a century and a half ago. Only a fool would say he had actually succeeded in furthering the tradition — by bringing it full circle — but I can say that this is my intention and, even if I fail, I’ve made some beautiful discoveries in trying. I’ve also endeavoured, as with my last book, to make the most difficult of subjects — in this case metaphysics, depth psychology and the history of art and religion — accessible and enjoyable.

I have started Self & Unself, but it is currently nowhere near being completed and will take a dreadfully long time to do so if I have to stay in paid employment or — another option, which seems increasingly attractive — walk the earth.

Here’s a brief draft excerpt from the introduction, screen-grabbed from my text editor…

Sam How: Rabbit

The epic story of Sam How, a multi-talented, musical but extremely simple rabbit, living the good life with his friends in a Kentish wood; until the arrival of a pile of shoddily constructed flatpack tables sends him onto an odyssey into central London, where he discovers a strange world of alcoholic pigeons, huge tasteless carrots, sad confused humans and hideous games that nobody seems to be able to win, or enjoy, or even understand. As the heroic rodent seeks out and discovers the source of this epic misery, the forces of darkness gradually close upon his friends back in the forest.

Here’s a page in progress…

Drowning is Fine

Drowning is fine is the story of Daniel Jones, a young man struggling on the outer edge of contemporary London. Life as an artist hasn’t turned out quite as he had expected; instead of weekends in Berlin, beautiful women covered in blue paint and exhilarating parachutes from the pyramid-peaks of fame, he is trapped in an endlessly replicating gallery of one cloned woman, haunted by the bodiless nightmare of Total Work and pinballed by desires he can’t fathom from sexual nightmare to emotional apocalypse. But help is at hand. Igwe the street-cleaner promises to make him wider (for £420), nearly-dead Len shows Daniel that death is not a visitor at the end of life, but a constant enigmatic companion, and his friend Simon is always ready to laugh at Daniel’s romantic failures. Eventually, through a spiraling psychological odyssey down through the offices, brothels, art galleries and psychiatric institutions of London, Daniel arrives at the absurd doors of death herself, where he finds the love and the beauty he was always looking for; but nowhere near where he supposed they would be.

Here’s a page;

Other Work…

I have also completed, amongst other things, Dawn, the story of a sensitive and fiery young working-class woman, born into poverty, who through extraordinary adversity, confronts and overcomes her attachment to security and her fear of independence, Fired, a six part black comedy-drama which follows a gently anarchic oddbod who loses a succession of jobs while slowly being drawn into an epic battle between the forces of good and evil (I might turn this into a novel), BUTV, a truly mind-blowing comedy sketch-show; mad, butcherous, beautiful, sweet and mind-bendingly anarchic, Wonderworld, a devastatingly sexy fairy tale for our times and 33 Myths of the System, a hyper-radical guide to the unworld entire.

Dawn is a follow-up to Drowning is Fine, so no need to release that now, Fired and BUTV are television shows and faaaaar beyond my budget and although I would like to physically publish 33 Myths of the System soon, it is already free and available and so also of less importance.

Here’s a moment from Fired…

Other Ways You Can Help…

Please get the word out and share this page on social network forums or through emails to friends. If they are unfamiliar with my work, please direct them to some of the key posts on my blog. If you would like to be kept up to date with this campaign or receive news about my work, sign up to my mailing list here.

Thank You

I’ve answered a few funding FAQs here. If you have any other questions, please get in touch with me though my site, here.

Those of you who have read The Apocalypedia (available here), Belly Up! (here) and my free book 33 Myths of the System (available here) will have a good idea of what I have to offer. If you are new to my work, please take a look at my website (here).
Here is a brief selection of quotes from readers.

I've been studying your blog and the Apocalypedia for the better part of a year now, and I'm constantly amazed at the clarity, but also poignancy and humor of your writing…
Your website is a gift to our times: I learned truths that have made me more alive, and reminded me of things that I’ve always known, but didn’t have the courage to act on…
I am absolutely fascinated with your book 33 Myths of The System. It has left my life in shambles…! 
Your writing has been revolutionary to me over the past few months. You have put into words so much of what I feel.
Through reading 33 Myths, and in conjunction with the various realities of my new situation, I found the wherewithal to make changes in my life over the last 12 months that I would have not dreamed of making in the years prior.
I recently basically read your entire website and laughed and cried (actually currently still crying).
After reading so many books, it’s hard not to feel you’re just reading the same things, said in different ways but really found this otherwise in your thought and understand of our current state of affairs and how we got here. Genuinely original, very uncommon!
I cried all the time while I was reading it. It also made me sick. As in actual diarrhea and nausea. While mentally it didn’t clash with me, my body reacted to it. I can’t wait to order it. 

Probably you won’t feel quite such wondrous joy at reading my stuff, but I’ve been looking into the moribund state of civilisation for three decades now; not just that, but, as far as possible, living as ‘if the day had come’. If you’re reading this, you’re probably starting to do the same, and you’re sure to find insights in my work which will strengthen your intuitions and convictions.

Alright, Why Now…?
I wouldn’t be asking for so much money to do all this for myself if, firstly, I hadn’t explored every other option, secondly, if I didn’t think that time was running short for humanity, thirdly if I weren’t skint and, fourthly, if I wasn’t stone cold certain that the world, or — no, not the world, of course not — that its most sensitive denizens need to hear what I have to say.
Here is a brief introduction to the books I have lined up:

Self & Unself
Self and Unself is a guide to reality and self, covering the breadth and plumbing the depth of human — and non-human — experience. It was originally conceived as the sister volume to 33 Myths of the System (originally titled 33 Myths of the Ego), the intention being to do for the illusions of the human mind what my previous book did for the human world, but it has since expanded into something richer and stranger.
Western philosophy has had nothing very meaningful to say since Schopenhauer died, a century and a half ago. Only a fool would say he had actually succeeded in furthering the tradition — by bringing it full circle — but I can say that this is my intention and, even if I fail, I’ve made some beautiful discoveries in trying. I’ve also endeavoured, as with my last book, to make the most difficult of subjects — in this case metaphysics, depth psychology and the history of art and religion — accessible and enjoyable.
I have started Self & Unself, but it is currently nowhere near being completed and will take a dreadfully long time to do so if I have to stay in paid employment or — another option, which seems increasingly attractive — walk the earth.
Here’s a brief draft excerpt from the introduction, screen-grabbed from my text editor…

Sam How: Rabbit
The epic story of Sam How, a multi-talented, musical but extremely simple rabbit, living the good life with his friends in a Kentish wood; until the arrival of a pile of shoddily constructed flatpack tables sends him onto an odyssey into central London, where he discovers a strange world of alcoholic pigeons, huge tasteless carrots, sad confused humans and hideous games that nobody seems to be able to win, or enjoy, or even understand. As the heroic rodent seeks out and discovers the source of this epic misery, the forces of darkness gradually close upon his friends back in the forest.
Here’s a page in progress…

Drowning is Fine
Drowning is fine is the story of Daniel Jones, a young man struggling on the outer edge of contemporary London. Life as an artist hasn’t turned out quite as he had expected; instead of weekends in Berlin, beautiful women covered in blue paint and exhilarating parachutes from the pyramid-peaks of fame, he is trapped in an endlessly replicating gallery of one cloned woman, haunted by the bodiless nightmare of Total Work and pinballed by desires he can’t fathom from sexual nightmare to emotional apocalypse. But help is at hand. Igwe the street-cleaner promises to make him wider (for £420), nearly-dead Len shows Daniel that death is not a visitor at the end of life, but a constant enigmatic companion, and his friend Simon is always ready to laugh at Daniel’s romantic failures. Eventually, through a spiraling psychological odyssey down through the offices, brothels, art galleries and psychiatric institutions of London, Daniel arrives at the absurd doors of death herself, where he finds the love and the beauty he was always looking for; but nowhere near where he supposed they would be.
Here’s a page;

Other Work…
I have also completed, amongst other things, Dawn, the story of a sensitive and fiery young working-class woman, born into poverty, who through extraordinary adversity, confronts and overcomes her attachment to security and her fear of independence, Fired, a six part black comedy-drama which follows a gently anarchic oddbod who loses a succession of jobs while slowly being drawn into an epic battle between the forces of good and evil (I might turn this into a novel), BUTV, a truly mind-blowing comedy sketch-show; mad, butcherous, beautiful, sweet and mind-bendingly anarchic, Wonderworld, a devastatingly sexy fairy tale for our times and 33 Myths of the System, a hyper-radical guide to the unworld entire.
Dawn is a follow-up to Drowning is Fine, so no need to release that now, Fired and BUTV are television shows and faaaaar beyond my budget and although I would like to physically publish 33 Myths of the System soon, it is already free and available and so also of less importance.
Here’s a moment from Fired…


Other Ways You Can Help…
Please get the word out and share this page on social network forums or through emails to friends. If they are unfamiliar with my work, please direct them to some of the key posts on my blog. If you would like to be kept up to date with this campaign or receive news about my work, sign up to my mailing list here.
Thank You
I’ve answered a few funding FAQs here. If you have any other questions, please get in touch with me though my site, here.

story:
Short Summary

Disturbing changes are afoot in our world: the collapse of fish stocks and pollinating insects; the surge in high impact storms and fires; a resurgence of populism and retreat from collective welfare; the fuzzing of truth, and whether science exists or matters; a surge in desperate migration; and of course the breakdown of climate and ecological systems. How can we not go to dark places? 

Enter fiction and art. In an epiphany, while pondering my next non-fiction book it came to me that dramatic fiction was the tool I needed to use. And how much fun it could be writing it, even if the subject matter could be wrenching.

I am an educator, speaker, film-maker, writer and recovering politician. I have dedicated my working life (and a lot personal time and money) to promoting living more lightly. I want to do the right thing, but am constantly searching for what that is, and ways to get others to care and act. The science tells me that we as a species, or at least a civilized society, are in deep trouble-- for all manner of reasons, not least of which will be climate breakdown and ecological collapse, with the social collapse that accompany them. But I will not give in to despair. Nor will I sugar coat how bad things are and what a tough job it will be to make them better.

Burning Souls introduces us to people who chose to act, and kept trying even under attack. It explores the value of honesty, friendship and courage. Burning Souls reminds us we could have acted. Indeed we could still, NOW! 

 

 

Burning Souls, the fictional work of a burning soul, is undergoing final edits. Soon to come are proof-reading, jacket and book design and  layout. After that will come a first print run, an e-book design and then an audio book version. Finally, there will be the May 2019 launch (in Ottawa) and a cross-country "electrified road trip," fully blogged and photographed.

That's where I need your help.  I need additional funds to bring this baby home, and then out to the world. 

What We Need & What You Get

I need to raise $10,000 to pay for editing, permissions, proof-reading, jacket and book design, a first print run and a book launch. With luck, there will be money left over to help with the tour. I spend carefully but I also want a quality product. People do judge books by their covers, and the design and absence of typos!

I have created a number of unique perks. They range from "be the first to get a copy" (autographed if you like); to the Book Clubbers Delight (a copy for every member of your book club, plus a visit from the author -- by video or in person); to the Publishers Package, which includes a printed thank you and multiple copies; to the Writers Festival Appearance, which brings me to your event for multiple activities and media availability.

Your contribution, however large or small, will not got to waste. I WILL publish this book. It is so close I can taste it.

The Impact

Thousands of people across Canada, indeed internationally, know and respect my work as a writer, consultant, speaker and filmmaker. They know that what I start, I get done. They know of my passion, my commitment to integrity and my desire to leave a positive legacy.

Burning Souls continues that tradition. I, my work of passion and you -- the funder and reader -- will make sure of it.

Risks & Challenges

The publishing world is constantly changing. That's why I have involved accomplished writers, editors, publicity consultants and more in my creative process to date. But there are things you can control and others you cannot. Will the book be great? Will it sell? I'm doing my utmost to do what I can right, and then trust the universe to take care of the rest. As a friend's mother said to me as I headed off to Japan after university to look for work and find adventure: "David, you always land on your feet." I didn't know at the time that this was the aura I put out, and the reputation I had. I do now. Burning Souls will land on its feet!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. You can help me make noise about this fundraising campaign and the imminent release of Burning Souls. Please use the Indiegogo share tools you will find here. Whether it's Facebook or Twitter or e-mail or just mentioning it to your neighbour, you can be a burning soul too. If you've made it to here, you already are one!

If you've made it to here, you already are one!

story:
Story of My Book

Product Behavior Fit

How an understanding of human behavior drives the world's most successful products.

95% of our thoughts, emotions, and learnings happen before we are consciously aware of them. However, much of today’s technology is built based on the other 5%. This is the part users can articulate when they’re in focus groups, when they’re filling out surveys, or when they’re providing feedback to builders about what they think the next version of your product or website should be.

The stories users tell us are often post rationalizations of their decisions. It’s not that they are intentionally lying to us, it’s that much of their decision making happens outside of their conscious awareness. We’re asking users to provide explanations of behaviors they don’t truly understand themselves.

Technology has driven progress for decades and industries have reacted accordingly by dedicating enormous amounts of time and resources to progress in this domain by building bigger, faster, and more sophisticated systems. But what if the key to unlocking the potential of our ventures is not simply faster, better technology, but rather an understanding of what drives human behavior?

An untapped opportunity lies in the fusion of technological innovation and psychological insights.

I believe that technological innovation alone can move us forward, but we can only realize the true potential of what we can build when we blend it with psychology.

My name is Nate Andorsky and I am the author of Product Behavior Fit. I wrote this book because I believe an understanding of the human experience is the secret to building technology to improve human outcomes. 

My hope is that, in reading this book, you will discover how an understanding of what drives human behavior is the key to unlocking the potential of your product. In this book, I hope to instill the same sort of passion and excitement that I have for understanding what drives human behavior and the ways in which it can be integrated into technology to help us improve human outcomes.

In this book, you'll learn about the intersection of behavioral economics and product design:

  • An understanding of what drives human behavior and the internal and external factors that impact our everyday decision-making process
  • An understanding of behavioral economics and how this field of study manifests itself within product design
  • Why user interviews, feedback groups, and surveys from users only tell you 5% of the information you need
  • In-depth analysis of successful consumer-facing software products and how they leverage an understanding of human behavior to drive adoption and engagement
  • Why taking a behavioral first approach to building products is a must if you want to create products that realize their full potential 
  • A framework for how to integrate the learnings in this book into your own product design

 

The Book - Product Behavior Fit

Product Behavior Fit is a non-fiction book that speaks to technologists, innovators, and entrepreneurs who are looking to understand what drives human behavior to create consumer-facing software products that are built on and understanding of the human experience.

Part 1 - Introduction 

I’ll dig deep into how much of our decision making happens outside of our conscious awareness. I'll discuss why asking users what they want and then building it is a flawed approach because users don’t truly know what they want. I’ll make the case that the next revolution will be psychological, not technological, and why those who fail to understand what truly drives human behavior will be left behind.

 

Part 2 - Meeting Our Future Selves

I'll then examine products that help us become better versions of ourselves, such as apps to help us lose weight, eat healthier, exercise more and become smarter.  I’ll examine the psychological headwinds that are preventing us from achieving our future selves and highlight ways to combat them. We'll dig deep into commitment devices, reframing techniques, and behavioral strategies for helping your users build healthy habits. 

 

Part 3 - Born to Follow

In this section, we'll dig into how what others do has an impact on what we're likely to do. We make our own decisions based on the choices that we see others making, for better or for worse. We'll dig into why we are so influenced by the crowd and how this can be leveraged successfully in product design.

 

Part 4 - How We View and Process Information

Even the best decision-makers are heavily influenced by their environment. In this section, I’ll discuss the factors outside of ourselves that impact our behavior. From emotional reactance to the processing of visual stimuli to our crippling aversion to change, you’ll be hard-pressed to find an individual who makes truly economically sound decisions. This section explains why. 

 

Part 5 - Creating a Base Behavioral Model for Your Product

In the final section, we’ll adjust our focus to the application of these theories. We’ll discuss the ways you can integrate all the behavioral insights we’ve learned throughout this book into actionable techniques for building products. This overview of our Base Behavioral Model creation process will allow you to take a truly behavioral first approach to your product ventures. We will also discuss what the future holds in terms of human behavior and technology.

 

What I Need

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in April 2020
  • The Cover Design of my Book - the mockups you see currently are a placeholder!
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (Physical Copy, Ebook Formats)
  • The Copyediting for My Book - to help polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book - when I ultimately publish this April.

When I pre-sell 100 copies of my book, I will publish it. When I pre-sell 150 copies of my book, I will also publish an audiobook. When I pre-sell 200 copies of my book, I will publish a hardcover edition.

 

What You'll Get

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

  • A personally signed copy of my book when I publish
  • A personal, handwritten thank you note for pre-ordering my book
  • Your Name will appear in the acknowledgments section of my book (“With special thanks to...”)
  • Early access to the introduction of the book
  • The opportunity to help give me feedback on cover designs and involvement in the selection process
  • I will do a book topic/workshop seminar where I will share my experiences throughout the writing process
  • And more...

 

About the Author

Nate is an entrepreneur who uses behavioral economics to build digital strategies and technology for today's most innovative companies and nonprofits. He believes the key to unlocking the potential of technology lies within our understanding of the psychological factors that drive human decision-making. By combining scientific findings with outside-of-the-box thinking, he helps turn human understanding into business advantages. 

As the CEO of Creative Science, he leads a team focused on this mission. He is a frequent international speaker, has been featured in Forbes, INC Magazine, and Huffington Post and his team’s work has earned accolades from Fast Company and TopNonProfits.com. Prior to Creative Science, he was a team member at the Startup America Partnership, a nonprofit led by Steve Case to help build entrepreneurial communities throughout the US. He geeks out about the intersection of human behavior and the ways in which it can improve human outcomes.

For more information, you can connect with Nate at nate@creativescience.co.

 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer. Specifically, my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies into each pre-order tier of the campaign.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone. You will know when the copies of my book you pre-ordered are expected to ship.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please Share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn with your friends, family, and network.

  • Please use #productbehaviorfit and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts.
  • You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page
  • Please share my book with 5 friends, family members, or co-workers who you think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or Direct Message on social media.

Thank you so much for all of your love and support!

Thanks again,
Nate

story:
***English will follow***

La famille du côté de ma mère est dispersée dans différentes provinces de l’Ouest, et je n’ai jamais eu la chance de les rencontrer. En 2012, je me suis rendue chez mes grand-parents à Summerland en Colombie-Britannique pour la première fois en 25 ans. J’ai donc passé du temps à documenter leur quotidien en essayant de les reproduire le plus fidèlement possible. J’ai tout récemment appris que mon grand-père subira une arthroplastie, qui je sais sera aussi difficile pour ma grand-mère ainsi que le reste de notre famille. 

C’est ici que j’ai besoin de votre aide!

Pendant 60 jours, je voyagerai de Montréal jusqu’au Territoires du Nord-Ouest en documentant le quotidien d’une nouvelle personne par jour, incluant mes grand-parents ainsi que tous les membres de ma famille que je n’ai jamais rencontré. Le but est d’aller à la découverte de mes racines tout en capturant des images qui racontent en profondeur des histoires authentiques de différentes familles. Je veux montrer qu’en débit de ses zones largement inhabitées, les «roadtrips» à travers le Canada peuvent être accomplis et servir à assembler une riche archive qui souligne et unifie la diversité de ce pays.  

Vous pouvez suivre les actualités du site web à partir du 1er juillet et passer le mot à votre famille, vos amis, vos voisins ou n’importe quel étranger que vous croisez sur votre chemin! Cliquer sur le bouton « aimer » de la page Facebook me sera déjà d’une grande aide. Alors que je camperai sur la route en vivant sur un budget très minime, chacun de vos dons contribuera à payer la pellicule nécessaire pour la prise de photo ainsi que la création d’un livre du projet. De plus, vous recevrez un cadeau en retour!

Le but de cette collecte de fonds via les réseaux sociaux est orienté vers un mode d’action participatif où chacun est invité à contribuer et à participer au projet. Votre contribution aura le pouvoir de changer mon itinéraire et aura un impact sur le contenu du projet. Toute personne dans différentes provinces du Canada est invitée à y participer et j’ai bien hâte de partager cette aventure avec vous! 

/////////

The family on my mother’s side is scattered across different provinces out west, and I’ve never had the chance to meet them. In 2012, I visited my grandparents in Summerland, BC for the very first time in 25 years, so I spent moments documenting their daily routines and imagining how I could best remember them. Recently, I learned that my grandfather will undergo arthroplasty, which I know will be stressful for my grandmother and the rest of our family.

Here’s where I need your help!

For 60 days, I will travel from Montreal to the Northwest Territories documenting the lives and stories of one person per day, including my grandparents and all members of my family who are complete strangers to me. The goal is to uncover my roots while capturing images that recount authentic family stories with detail and depth. I want to show that, in spite of its vastly uninhabited areas, road-trips through Canada can be completed to assemble a rich archive that underlines and unifies the diversity of this country.

You can follow the website starting July 1st and spread the word with family and friends, neighbours and complete strangers! Even just clicking the “Like” button on Facebook will be of great help. While I will be camping and living on a very low budget, every donation will help paying the medium format film stock as well as the fees for creating a book of the project. Plus, you'll receive a gift in return. 

The goal of this social media fundraising is oriented towards a participative mode of action where you are all invited to engage.Your contribution will have the power to change my route and impact this project’s content. Anyone in Canada will have the opportunity to be part of this adventure and I can’t wait to share it with you!

La famille du côté de ma mère est dispersée dans différentes provinces de l’Ouest, et je n’ai jamais eu la chance de les rencontrer. En 2012, je me suis rendue chez mes grand-parents à Summerland en Colombie-Britannique pour la première fois en 25 ans. J’ai donc passé du temps à documenter leur quotidien en essayant de les reproduire le plus fidèlement possible. J’ai tout récemment appris que mon grand-père subira une arthroplastie, qui je sais sera aussi difficile pour ma grand-mère ainsi que le reste de notre famille. 

C’est ici que j’ai besoin de votre aide!

story:
¿Qué?

La heredera es una novela llena de suspense y misterio que no os dejará indiferentes.

Danielle, de diecisiete años y del siglo XXI, nos narra la historia de un personaje histórico como fue Erzsébeth Báthory, mujer  reconocida como uno de los tres vampiros reales en la historia. Una asesina serial que estaba obsesionada con la belleza y la idea de la vida eterna. Esta delirante mujer se bañaba y bebía la sangre de doncellas vírgenes de la región para mantenerse joven y hermosa.

Tras su juicio, Báthory fue sentenciada a ser emparedada viva. De este modo,  fue encerrada en uno de los muros de su castillo. Después de años de agonía tras los muros, la Condesa dejó de existir, pero ¿Dejó de existir su maldad? ¿Por qué una chica del siglo XXI es nuestra guía en su historia?

¿Quiénes?

Tandaia es una editorial con voluntad de cambio, de dar la alternativa a autores que no la encuentran en otro lugar, con nuevas y refrescantes ideas como es el emplear una campaña preventa para valorar la aceptación y viabilidad de cada título.

De este modo eres tú, ahora que te estás planteando cómo colaborar, el que decide si la obra que te presentamos verá la luz pasando a formar parte de nuestro catálogo... porque consideramos al lector parte fundamental del proceso.

Nadie mejor que la propia autora para presentarse.

Mi nombre es Natalia Calceteiro Ballesta y La Heredera es mi primera novela. Soy profesora y actriz amateur de musicales. La escritura ha sido una de mis pasiones desde niña. Tras la finalización de un Máster de Escritura Creativa en la Universidad de Sevilla, me aventuro a intentar publicar mi obra, y, aunque tengo escrito multitud de cuentos, poemas y micro relatos, este es mi primer proyecto de envergadura, y la primera vez que, desde mi punto de vista, he alcanzado el valor literario necesario para publicar. No obstante, creo que mi obra y escritura irá evolucionando y madurando a medida que avance mi carrera como escritora.

¿Por qué?

Y por aquí una muestra de lo que encontraréis en sus páginas:

«―¡Brifeault! ―gritó Slavic―. ¡Guardias! ¡Atrapadle! ¡Que no escape! ―ese individuo que atacó a la mujer lanzó una carcajada y mirándome me advirtió.
          ―Esta vez he fallado, pero la próxima bala será para vuestro corazón ―tras lanzar su amenaza, desapareció por la ventana. La caída mataría a cualquiera, pero de él no se halló ni rastro.
          Slavic personalmente, salió en búsqueda del que fuera uno de sus súbditos. Ahora era un traidor. La mujer, que estaba fuera de peligro, fue atendida de inmediato y se nos ordenó retirarnos. Ludivine miró a Erika buscando en ella un consuelo o una protección, no lo sé bien. La amazona y yo compartimos una breve mirada de desconcierto y cada una se retiró en silencio a nuestra alcoba. Al entrar en la mía, me sorprendió ver a Cornelia, pero no le di la mayor importancia.
          ―¡Dios mío, Cornelia! ¡Brifeault está loco! ―le contaba mientras me desvestía y ella cerraba la puerta. Me sorprendió encontrarla en mi habitación, y lo cierto es que la noté extraña, pero pensé que estaría cansada. Tenía la mirada fija en su delantal y me daba la espalda―. Ha intentado atacar a Slavic en medio de la fiesta.
          ―Quizá no era al señor a quien quería atacar…
          ―No, lo peor es que una pobre mujer se ha llevado una bala. La confundió conmigo.
          ―Una pena…
          ―¿Cómo dices? ―giré para mirar a mi doncella y lo que me encontré fue la punta afilada de un puñal apuntándome a la garganta―. ¿Qué haces, Cornelia?
          ―Lo siento mucho, señorita. Me habéis tratado bien y con respeto, pero ningún lobo lleva su propia piel cuando va a atacar al rebaño. Abrid la ventana ―obedecí, le quité el seguro a la ventana y abrí los cristales de par en par―. Y ahora, vais a saltar.
          ―¿Qué? ¡Ni hablar!
          ―Vais a morir de igual manera. Si no es saltando, es porque os atravesaré el gaznate con este cuchillo. Pero alguien como vos no puede seguir en este mundo. Por eso, debéis morir…
         Esta vez no tuve que pensar, no me quedaba alternativa. Lancé una patada al vientre de Cornelia, haciendo que se desplomase. Grité y los soldados se encontraron con una puerta atrancada que intentaban demoler. En el caos de la lucha, logré hacerme con el puñal con el que casi me perfora la garganta, y tan pronto Cornelia logró ponerse en pie, salté encima, enfrentándola con un rugido de fiera y puñal en mano. Le apunté al cuello, pero volvió a embestirme con tal fuerza que el cuchillo cayó al fuego. La doncella me agarró por la garganta y comenzó a estrangularme, y, a más me esforzaba por zafarme de ella, más notaba que me faltaba el aire.
          ―Esto es por todas las mujeres que pasaron por tus manos, Condesa.
          Y al escuchar esas palabras volví a sentir ese calor ya familiar. Las fuerzas abandonaron y me volvían a poseer otras que no parecían ser las mías. Ebria de fuerza y ardor, giré a Cornelia sobre sí misma. Mis deseos de hacerle daño, mucho daño, iban en aumento, y tras asestarle varios golpes cargados de maldad, le golpeé la cabeza contra el suelo y le atesté un puntapié en el vientre. Miré sus ojos hinchados y dije:
          ―Köszöntsd azokat a nőket a pokolban. 
          Y sin esperar respuesta, le agarré por el pelo y la lancé contra el fuego. Sus alaridos solo fueron eclipsados por los gritos de terror que, tras echar abajo la puerta, contemplaron la horrible escena. Los soldados, la señora Hausa y otras doncellas no podían reprimir una mueca de espanto sin poder hacer nada. Sólo les quedaba ver cómo aquella chica, entre espasmos y gritos de dolor, se precipitaba por la ventana hacia la muerte. Después de eso, creo que me desplomé porque no recuerdo nada más»

¿Cómo?

Para arrancar el proyecto nos hemos fijado como objetivo 920€; esta es la cantidad que recaudaríamos si alrededor de cincuenta mecenas se hiciesen, cada cual, con un ejemplar de esta primera edición.

  • Teniendo acceso a las galeradas de edición.
  • Recibiendo un ejemplar semanas antes de la salida al mercado de la obra.
  • Si bien, también podrías ver tu nombre en los agradecimientos aportando un poco más.

Los fondos recaudados, se utilizarán como ayuda para sacar adelante esta primera edición de La heredera que saldría después a la venta.

Además...

Sabemos que son tiempos difíciles, también nosotros los sufrimos, y es posible que no te encuentres en disposición de apoyarnos con tu mecenazgo en estos momentos... pero esperamos que si esto te ha llegado al alma, incluso si tal vez conoces en persona a la autora, trates de difundir esta campaña (facebook, twitter, blogger, boca-oreja... ) para que alcancemos nuestra meta y Natalia Calceteiro Ballesta vea publicada su obra.

Gracias por vuestro tiempo.
