story:
The Professional Touch

My name is Jim Maher, and I write books for kids. I am also from Canada, where the kids' publishing industry is in a constant state of flux. I have three boys, all under the age of eight, and I am a stay-at-home father. Writing has been my dream since I was five, and I keep that dream alive every day.

I would like my latest book, Lyric, to get professionally edited. A fresh pair of eyes, someone with an objective touch that can dig in and mine out the best story possible.

What We Need

Without further ado, I need buckazoids.

  • $300 for a first readthrough and manuscript evaluation.
  • $2000 (approx) for the substantive edit and story overhaul. This is where the editor tells me if my story needs to go back to the drawing board, or if I've actually got something worth telling here.

What You Get

The perks, for the intrepid souls that go down this mad road of fiction, are:
  • $1 gets you a mention in the acknowledgments and an e-copy.
  • $5 gets you a full-on thank you in the front bit, you know, where they do the dedication stuff and an e-copy.
  • $20 gets you a hard copy, an e-copy, and one of the pens I used to write the book. Chewed on, stolen by a child at some point, and maybe not even the real one. I'll send you a pen, regardless.
  • $100 and I'll make a Youtube video of me singing 'Let It Go' in various terrible celebrity voices. Plus, you get a hard copy, an e-copy and my eternal gratitude.
  • $200 and I'll send you a Lyric t-shirt, a hard copy, an e-copy, and my promise that I will take down the offensive 'Let It Go' video once the book is edited.

story:
Hi everyone! Welcome to my indie go go page!


I am a professional musician and music teacher. When I first moved to Seattle I worked as a full time pre-school teacher. During nap time I would mop the pre-school floors. After mop time and nap time, I would tell the children a Mr. Mop story. Mr. Mop is a super hero whom with the help of  children, cleans up after mess-makers and polluters. He has yet to catch the villain Dirty Bubble and his side kick Glub Glub the pirate goldfish. I had hundreds of stories and it soon became one of children's favorite activities. Two years ago I decided to make these stories a physical reality.  Over the past two years I have finished writing and recording the songs, went back to school for illustration, and have finally finished the artwork for the first zany, mucky story. I'm fortunate to be working with amazing professionals; an editor, a graphic designer and  an engineer. Together this team is working hard to  bring this story/musical to life. 


My Goal: Just $5,000 will help bring this adventure story to life. The funds will go directly to the printing, shipping, recording, and duplication. The first run of books will be (500). Once the book is printed a giant musical extravaganza will take place. Sunday Nov 8th, at 3pm, Mr. Ryan with a team of musicians and actors will perform the Mr. Mop Musical for the world (this event will take place in Seattle at Jet City Improv). When children and families attend the performance, they will encounter many wonders, face paint stations, balloons, Muck, dance floor dress up, and variety of musical acts. 

I hope to reach my $5,000 goal by the end of Sept, and will send out the perks by October/November -Just in time for perfect Christmas/ Holiday gift. 

Please take a moment and watch the video about the book and check out the perks. 

Just a few of the Perks:

What else can you do to help? The best thing you can do is share this campaign.  Tell your friends, family, enemies, mop like dogs, and pirate goldfish. If you get tired of talking, share this campaign on the internet and social media platforms. We independent artists appreciate the support!

Once the book is printed a giant musical extravaganza will take place. Sunday Nov 8th, at 3pm, Mr. Ryan with a team of musicians and actors will perform the Mr. Mop Musical for the world (this event will take place in Seattle at Jet City Improv). When children and families attend the performance, they will encounter many wonders, face paint stations, balloons, Muck, dance floor dress up, and variety of musical acts. 
I hope to reach my $5,000 goal by the end of Sept, and will send out the perks by October/November -Just in time for perfect Christmas/ Holiday gift. 
Please take a moment and watch the video about the book and check out the perks. Just a few of the Perks:
What else can you do to help? The best thing you can do is share this campaign.  Tell your friends, family, enemies, mop like dogs, and pirate goldfish. If you get tired of talking, share this campaign on the internet and social media platforms. We independent artists appreciate the support!

story:
+ Booktrailers

Ve booktrailer en español de la abuela que canta - versión juguetona: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xf-aH9JoWMc

Watch booktrailer in English at:
http://duendescaseros.blogspot.com.es/p/booktrailer.html

Regardez le booktrailer en français:http://duendescaseros.blogspot.com.es/p/booktrailer.html

Bienvenidos / Welcome Somos Daniela Guglielmetti (ilustradora) y Ma. Gabriela Lovera (escritora) y nos hemos reunido nuevamente para crear un libro infantil ilustrado. Se trata de un compendio de descripciones de 22 duendes caseros distintos, esos que habitan en los rincones más recónditos de una casa y que muchas veces pasan desapercibidos para la mayoría de los humanos, sobre todo los adultos.

ENGLISH:
We are Daniela Guglielmetti (illustrator) and Ma. Gabriela Lovera (writer), and we have gathered once more to create an illustrated children's book full of fantasy and wit. It is a book with descriptions of 22 different household elves, those that live in the most hidden corners of a house, and most of the times go unnoticed by humans, especially adults.

Más del libro /Read more about the book: http://duendescaseros.blogspot.com.es/


El libro / The book

Pequeño gran tratado de duendes caseros
(Reg. M-003959/2013)

Es cierto que mucho se ha editado sobre duendes en general, pero poco se conoce de aquéllos que se circunscriben al ámbito doméstico, esos que se esconden tras los objetos más cotidianos: una tostadora, un enchufe, un felpudo, una maceta.
El libro va de ellos y se compondrá de la descripción de 22 duendes caseros cada uno con su entrada específica en la cual se describe el lugar donde habita, así como algunas de sus costumbres y rasgos de carácter más curiosos. Podría decirse que es una especie de compendio ilustrado cuyo fin es acercar al lector a una materia tan poco estudiada, pero no por ello menos importante: la Duendelología de lo casero. Todo esto con sumo rigor humorístico.

ENGLISH:
Grand Tiny Treatise of Household Elves
(Reg. M-003959/2013)
It is true that much has been published about elves in general, but little is known of those who are confined to the domestic sphere. Thanks to these curious creatures, Gabriela and Daniela have been able to bring out the magic that lies behind everyday objects:  toasters, plugs, doormats, flowerpots... With that unique perspective, they will recreate the world of these tiny beings to bring it to you as lively and bright as possible.
The Treatise will include detailed descriptions of 22 elves. Each one of them having an especific entry in which the author describes their dwelling place, as well as some of their most curious traits of character. The book could also be considered an illustrated compendium aimed to interest the reader in a little known subject: Household Elvesology. All this done with the utmost humorous rigor.

¡SO MUCH FUN AHEAD OF US!

Objetivo / Goal

Hemos lanzado esta campaña de micromecenazgo para pre-producir el libro con el fin de presentarlo a editoriales y brindarle a la obra la oportunidad de difusión y proyección que sólo una casa editorial puede ofrecer.
Hablamos de meses, incluso hasta de un año de arduo trabajo para poder darnos el espacio de creación necesario para gestar una obra de esta magnitud. Con tu aporte y colaboración, estamos seguras de que daremos vida a este singular libro.

ENGLISH:
We have launched this crowdfunding campaign to pre-produce the book in order to present a dummy to publishing houses, and therefore give the book the opportunity of having the best distribution and media coverage possible, something that a big publishing house can provide.
We are talking about months, even a year, of hard work, since we need the creative space and time to bring to life a book rich in detail and of the highest quality possible for us. With your support we are positive we can make it.

Visita el Blog del libro para conocer el proceso creativo de las autoras / Visit our blog at: http://duendescaseros.blogspot.com.es/

Patrocina / Contribute

Te proponemos que participes de la creación de este original tratado, acompañándonos en el proceso creativo que conlleve la pre-producción del libro.

¿CÓMO?

- Lo primero, pues haciendo un aporte económico a esta campaña de micromecenazgo.

-  Otra manera importante es comunicando y difundiendo la campaña entre tus familiares, amigos y conocidos. Generar eco es vital para que se conozca nuestro trabajo.

- También participando en nuestras redes sociales y Blog puedes generar intercambio, así como ofrecer tus sugerencias, opiniones... Nos interesa lo que tengas que decir. Visítanos en Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/duendescaseros?ref=hl

- Dándolo a conocer en una editorial o si eres editor contactándonos para presentarte nuestra propuesta de libro. Escríbenos a: duendescaseros@gmail.com

¡Gracias!

ENGLISH:
With your contribution and support, you will help us prepare the book for presentation to publishing houses and, of course, you will instantly become a honorable member of the "Illustrious Order of The Knights of Elves Eavesdropping". This means you will be part of the exclusive duendologist club, and if you contribute to the crowdfunding campaign, you will receive the appropriate accreditation... and perk!

HOW TO HELP

- Firstly, by making a financial contribution to this crowfunding campaign.

- Another important way is by communicating and spreading the news of this book project among your family, friends and acquaintances.

- Also by participating in our social networks and blog, you can leave comments, offer your suggestions, give opinions... We invite you to visit our facebook profile at: https://www.facebook.com/duendescaseros?ref=hl

- Are you an editor/publisher? Do you know one? We will be delighted to show you/him/her our book proposal. E-mail us at: duendescaseros@gmail.com

Thank you !

Más del libro /Read more about the book: http://duendescaseros.blogspot.com.es/

TU AYUDA EN %:

Agrandar imagen / enhance picture

Las autoras / The authors

Con anterioridad hemos explorado universos creativos que hemos plasmado en libros como: “Sabia vida savia: manual de irrealismo pragmático” o un oráculo rúnico. Puedes ver ambos trabajos visitando los siguientes enlaces:

Sabia vida savia: manual de irrealismo pragmático: http://issuu.com/dagugli/docs/saviavidasaviapdf

Oráculo rúnico ilustrado: https://www.behance.net/gallery/16814273/Diseno-Libro-Oraculo-de-las- Runas

LA ESCRITORA - María Gabriela Lovera Montero (Caracas, 1972):

Periodista, editora y Webmaster. Ha publicado varios poemarios en Venezuela y España. Ha sido incluída en diversas antologías y poemas suyos han aparecido en revistas digitales y en papel venezolanas y españolas. Actualmente colabora como voluntaria llevando la Web y las redes sociales de una importante escuela de cocina de su país: http://www.centroestudiosgastronomicos.org/
Blog de Gabriela: http://gabrielalovera.blogspot.com.es/

LA ILUSTRADORA - Daniela Guglielmetti (Santiago de Chile, 1973):

Artista plástico, ilustradora y Webmaster. Ha colaborado con numerosas revistas del sector editorial venezolano, chileno, estadounidense, inglés y español; así como con proyectos editoriales y publicitarios públicos y privados. Ha participado y organizado distintas exposiciones individuales y colectivas. Le gusta el emprendimiento social y es la creadora del proyecto Dibujo a Domicilio: http://dibujoadomicilio.blogspot.com.es/
Blog de Daniela: http://dagugli.blogspot.com.es/

ENGLISH:
Both Daniela and Gabriela have explored creative univers in past publications such as:

Life Other Wise: Handbook of Pragmatic Irrealism. (Sabia visa savia: manual de irrealismo pragmático) See at: http://issuu.com/dagugli/docs/saviavidasaviapdf

Or an illustrated Celtic Rune Oracle (El oráculo de las runas). See at: https://www.behance.net/gallery/16814273/Diseno-Libro-Oraculo-de-las-%20Runas

THE WRITER - María Gabriela Lovera Montero (Caracas, 1972):

Journalist, editor and webmaster. Gabriela has published several poetry books in Venezuela and Spain. She has also been included in anthologies, and some of her poems have appeared in Venezuelan and Spanish online and paper magazines. Currently, she voluntarily collaborates as Webmaster and Community Manager for an important Venezuelan Culinary Arts Institute: http://www.centroestudiosgastronomicos.org/
More about Gabriela: http://gabrielalovera.blogspot.com.es/

THE ILLUSTRATOR - Daniela Guglielmetti (Santiago de Chile, 1973):

Artist, illustrator, and webmaster. Daniela has collaborated as an illustrator in many magazines and publications in Venezuela, Chile, Spain, USA, and the UK. Her pictorial work has been exhibited in Venezuela, Chile and Spain. She has worked in advertisement, and is the creator of "The Walk-in Artist" project (Dibujo a domicilio): http://dibujoadomicilio.blogspot.com.es/
More about Daniela: http://dagugli.blogspot.com.es/

Más del libro /Read more about the book: http://duendescaseros.blogspot.com.es/

Incentivos / Perks

€5 EUR (¡un millón de amigos! / tons of friends!)
¡Gracias! /Thanks!
Recibe una postal electrónica via mail con nuestro más sincero agradecimiento por tu apoyo + audio sorpresa personalizado + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital. Tiempo de entrega: antes de la navidad 2014

ENGLISH (6 $ aprox):
Receive an electronic postcard + funny recording + a digital diploma of Elvesologist.
Delivery time: before X-mas 2014

€15 EUR (100 postales / 100 postcards)
El cartero toca a tu puerta / the mailman knocks once
Recibe una postal física (impresión digital) con nuestro más sincero agradecimiento por tu apoyo y dedicatoria especial de las autoras + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital. Tiempo de entrega: antes de la navidad 2014

ENGLISH (18 $ aprox.):
Receive stamped postcard with special dedication + a digital diploma of Elvesologist. Delivery time: before X-mas 2014

€25 EUR (50 postales / 50 postcards)
El cartero toca 2 veces / the mailman knocks twice
Recibe una obra autentificada y numerada tamaño A5 (edición limitada) + una postal física (impresión digital) con nuestros más sincero agradecimiento por tu apoyo y dedicatoria especial de las autoras + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital.  Tiempo de entrega: mayo de 2015

ENGLISH (30 $ aprox.):
Receive an authentic and numbered artistic piece, size A5 stamped postcard  (limited edition) with special dedication + a digital diploma of Elvesologist. Delivery time: May 2014

€90 EUR (4 visitas / 4 visits)
Duendes a domicilio / Walk-in Elves
Recibe a dibujantes en tu casa para una sesión personalizada de Dibujo a domicilio en la cual te retratarán en exclusiva (ver Web: http://dibujoadomicilio.blogspot.com.es/) + un dibujo de la visita + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital. Sólo para residentes de Madrid.  Las visitas se celebran los días martes a las 19:30.

ENGLISH (108 $ aprox.):
Receive at home a group of artists from the "Madrid Walk-in Artist Project" (check video at: Web: http://dibujoadomicilio.blogspot.com.es/), who will make your portrait + a portrait from the visit + a digital diploma of Elvesologist. Only for Madrid residents. The sessions will be held on Tuedays at 7 pm.

€140 EUR (20 libros / 20 books)
Los 20 últimos / the last 20
Recibe una copia del libro anterior de las autoras titulado Sabia vida savia: manual de irrealismo pragmático con dedicatoria personalizada y escrita/dibujada a mano por las autoras + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital + un cartel del libro o 5 postales del libro ambos de edición limitada y numerada.
Sólo quedan 20 ejemplares de la impresión única de 2008. Se trata de un libro de colección. Tiempo de entrega: mayo 2015

ENGLISH (168 $ aprox.)
Receive a unique copy of the authors' previous book entitled "Life Other Wise: Handbook of Pragmatic Idealism" with original dedication + PDF with English translated text + a digital diploma of Elvesologist + a book poster or 5 book postcards (both options in limited and numbered edition). Delivery time: May 2015

€100 EUR ( 80 piezas / 80 pieces)
Clavadita a la pared / Hammered to the wall
Recibe una obra seriada y autentificada (ejemplo: 1/ 80) en tamaño A3 de las autoras de la cual se harán tres modelos de diseño a escoger + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital. Tiempo de entrega: mayo de 2015

ENGLISH (120 $ aprox.):
Receive an artistic poster numbered and signed by the artist, size A3 (3 models to choose from) + a digital diploma of Elvesologist. Delivery time: May 2015

€180 EUR (20 dibujos / 20 drawings)
Arte que va y viene 1 / Art comes and goes 1
Recibe un dibujo de la artista Daniela Guglielmetti de la serie Dibujo a Domicilio (ver en: https://www.facebook.com/dagugli) + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital. Tiempo de entrega: mayo de 2015

ENGLISH (216 $ aprox.):
Receive an original illustration by Daniel Guglielmetti from the series "Walk-in Artist" (check at: https://www.facebook.com/dagugli) + a digital diploma of Elvesologist. Delivery time: May 2015

€180 EUR (20 unidades / 20 drawings)
Arte que va y viene 1 / Art comes and goes 2
Recibe un collage original con poema de la escritora Ma. Gabriela Lovera + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital (ver trabajos en: http://collageamoi.blogspot.com.es/).). Tiempo de entrega: mayo de 2015

ENGLISH (216 $ aprox.):
Receive an original collage by Ma. Gabriela Lovera (check examples at:http://collageamoi.blogspot.com.es/) + a digital diploma of Elvesologist. Delivery time: May 2015

€200 EUR (8 plazas / 8 seats)
Cena con duendes / Dine with Elves
Velada con las autoras + cena gastronómica a cargo de un chef amigo + sorpresa literaria + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital.
La fecha se pautará de acuerdo a la disponibilidad de los interesados, las autoras y el chef. Favor advertir de cualquier alergia o preferencia alimentaria.
Se celebrará en Madrid.

ENGLISH (240 $ aprox.):
Have dinner with the authors with literary surprise and a meal prepared by a Spanish chef + a digital diploma of Elvesologist.
Please inform of any allergies or food choice preferences.
The dinner will take place in Madrid.

€550 EUR (1 obra original / 1 original watercolor)
Un poco de "Sabia vida savia" / A bit of Life Other Wise
Recibirás la última acuarela original e irrepetible de una de las ilustraciones del libro anterior de las autoras titulado Sabia vida savia: manual de irrealismo pragmático + un ejemplar de dicho libro + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital. Tiempo de entrega: mayo de 2015

ENGLISH (660 $ aprox):
Receive the last original watercolor form the authors' previous book entitled "Life Other Wise: Handbook of Pragmatic Idealism" + an autographed sample of this previous book + a digital diploma of Elvesologist. Delivery time: May 2015

€1000 EUR (2 personas / 2 people)
Apadrina un duende / Sponsor an elf
Crearemos un duende a tu medida que incluiremos en el libro + un original de la ilustración del duende acompañada de su descripción y firmada por las autoras + un diploma de duendólogo en versión digital.  Tiempo de entrega: mayo de 2015

ENGLISH (1200 $ aporx.):
We will create an elf inspired by you that will be included in the book + the original illustration, and description of this very special elf signed by the authors + a digital diploma of Elvesologist. Delivery time: May 2015

Importante / Important

CONDICIONES DE ENVÍO de los incentivos o recompensas: todas las recompensas incluyen gastos de envío postal ordinario dentro España, así como a otros países de Europa y al resto del mundo. Si el interesado desea que su envío sea efectuado por mensajería privada, debe correr él mismo con los gastos.

PERKS MAILING CONDITIONS: All perks will be sent by ordinary mail. If you wish for us to use a private mailing service, you will be charged for it.

Conoce más / Know more

BLOG DEL LIBRO / BOOK BLOG:  http://duendescaseros.blogspot.com.es/
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/duendescaseros?ref=hl

story:
Har du någon gång känt dig inspirerad av det jag har skrivit? Vill du ha mer? Eller vill du ge tillbaka för det du redan fått?

Stöd mig så att jag kan hjälpa fler!

Vad Jag Behöver & Vad Du Får

De senaste tre åren har jag på heltid hjälpt människor att växa och leva ett liv i passion. På flera olika sätt har jag inspirerat, utbildat, coachat och stöttat. Av mina klienter och följare har jag fått mängder av bevis på att jag lyckats med det jag vill ge. Men ska jag vara ärlig så är det en sak jag inte varit fullt lika grym på - och det är att tjäna pengar. Jag har bränt igenom mina sparpengar till förmån för att peppa, boosta och utbilda. Så jag har inte en stor buffert att ta av, att skriva en bok tar mycket arbetstid och är inte kostnadsfritt. Därav behöver jag din support! 

Det jag specifikt kommer använda pengarna till är: 

  • Korrekturläsning, sättning, redigering
  • Bokcoach
  • Tryckning
  • Illustrationer
  • Omslagsdesign 

Pengarna går först och främst till att få ett så färdigt innehåll som möjligt, så får jag inte in hela summan så gör jag klar bokens insida så mycket jag kan. Får jag in mer pengar så går de till marknadsföring och bokagent. Och till att göra en ännu fetare releasefest som alla som donerat får komma på! 

Det finns så många nivåer att hjälpa mig på och du kan få allt från en kram, en signerad bok till en heldag med mig i San Francisco! Till höger finner du alla olika varianter. Hoppas de gör dig lika taggad som mig. 

Längtan

Jag vet att denna boken är efterfrågad, alla frågor jag får varje vecka visar på att det finns ett stort behov. Människor längtar efter att ta steget och leva ett liv som passar bättre ihop med deras inre värderingar.

Jag har länge bloggat, skrivit artiklar, instagrammat och facebookat. Delat med mig av ord för att inspirera och få människor att växa och våga. Nu är det dags att ta nästa steg. Att skapa en samling av visdomar, fakta och inspiration. En bok som hjälper till och stöttar. Som får dig att våga skapa och leva ditt drömliv. Jag längtar efter att få skriva den.

Vem är Sanne?

En ung entreprenör som vigt sitt liv åt att hjälpa andra. Världens yngsta LifeSpider System Coach, grundare av KALI – ett nätverk för unga kvinnor och medgrundare av WOW!CAMP – inspirationsläger för unga kvinnor. Jag har bott i fyra olika länder, haft fler jobb än fingrar och blivit privatutbildad i USA. Jag kallar mig världsmedborgare och digital nomad, med företagandet och världsförändrandet i min laptop.

Historien bakom

Jag tog mig ur en vardag som inte gjorde mig lycklig. Jag skapade mig ett meningsfullt drömliv där jag lever efter mina värderingar. Nu vill jag dela med mig av alla tips, tricks och insikter som jag har lärt mig på vägen. Hur du kan gå från en grå vardag till ett liv fyllt av spännande möten, vackra platser, betydelsefullt arbete och FRIHET!

Jag skriver boken jag själv hade behövt läsa för 4 år sedan. När jag inte visste exakt vad jag ville, bara att jag ville ha MER! 

Flera gånger under mina små och stora livsförändringar fick jag känslan av "Varför har ingen berättat det här för mig?". Jag upplevde det som att jag fick uppfinna hjulet på nytt och att det var så många små enkla insikter som hade fått mig att slippa flera motgångar. Det är just dessa kunskaper jag nu ämnar dela med mig av. Så att du slipper slösa tid på att göra misstag du faktiskt inte behöver - så du kan koncentrera dig på att göra misstag och framsteg som verkligen tar dig framåt. 

Men jag klarar det inte ensam. 

Utan dig kommer inte boken kunna nå ut. För jag har inte ensam de resurserna som behövs. Jag tror och hoppas att du, liksom jag, brinner för att se människor leva ett liv i passion. Att du, som jag, har fått nog av hur världen ser ut just nu - att människor spenderar sina liv på arbeten de ogillar, med människor som de inte älskar, konsumerar för att slippa känna och aldrig riktigt lyssnar inåt på sitt hjärta. Jag tror att du, liksom jag, tror på att alla människor kan leva ett liv de drömmer om och hitta sin inre styrka. Att denna världen hade blivit till en bättre planet om rätt person hade befunnit sig på rätt plats.

Andra Sätt Du Kan Hjälpa Till

Du kanske inte har råd att stötta mig materiellt just nu, men jag behöver även annan stöttning. Dela det här i dina sociala medier, tipsa vänner som du tror vill läsa boken och sprid ordet på alla sätt du kan. Din kärlek och stöd behövs på alla sätt!

Stöd mig så jag kan hjälpa fler!

story:
Who is Lindsey Wilson?

Lindsey Wilson has been the chief theater critic for D Magazine since 2010. Before that, she reviewed theater in Denver, Boston, and Off-Broadway in New York City.

She also reports on theater for CultureMap Dallas as one of the original contributors since its launch in 2012. Spotlighting local actors and theater professionals, writing previews and round-ups, and urging DFW to embrace its incredible arts community is her goal.

She is also the Texas regional editor for Morris Visitor Publications, where she plans and executes travel magazines, coffee-table books, and guides for Dallas-Fort Worth, Houston, and San Antonio.

Her freelance writing can be seen in the Dallas CVB annual travel guide, American Theatre magazine, and Playbill, among others.

Lindsey earned a master’s degree in Arts Journalism from Syracuse University (where she was honored with the Newhouse Graduate Award) and a bachelor’s degree in Theater from the University of Colorado at Boulder.

Lindsey enjoys playing tourist in her adopted city, from discovering hidden-gem watering holes and family-run restaurants to hanging out at the many museums and parks. Her hobbies include Netflixing, reading, and playing with her rescue dogs--and yes, going to the theater (even when she's not working).

What is the National Critics Institute?

The O'Neill National Critics Institute is designed for theater writers looking to strengthen their skills in an increasingly competitive job market.

At heart, NCI is an intensive writing workshop.  Critic-fellows turn out a piece of copy almost every night—a review of last night's show, a description of an individual actor's performance, an interview with the director.  After breakfast, the copy is read aloud and dissected by the group, under the direction of a seasoned theater writer or editor.  "A boring script?" Example, please.  "A great performance?" Prove it.

"We don't come to the O'Neill to tell the playwrights what's wrong with their scripts," says former NCI director Dan Sullivan, who reviewed theater for the Los Angeles Times for 20 years.  "This is about our process as writers—the place where we exercise our right to fail."

After lunch, the critic fellows are plunged into the O'Neill's production process.  Says Sullivan: "For two weeks we live and breathe theater. We find out—if we didn't know already, and as a rookie reviewer, I didn't—how a director puts a new play on its feet in four days.  If Edward Albee visits the O'Neill, we sit down with Edward Albee. Our lighting designer may have us hanging lights in the Barn.”

"It's a tough two weeks, not a vacation at the beach. We like to call it a boot camp for critics.  For critics with experience it's a re-boot. There's no other program like it."

This program is kind of a big deal, and Lindsey got in!

Actually, Lindsey got in last year but couldn't afford to go. This year, thanks to a generous scholarship (the highest one they gave out!), attending is more feasible. However, she still needs the remaining tuition and airfare to Connecticut, so let's help her get there!

Sorry, I'm broke. Anything else I can do?

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn't mean you can’t help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign!
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Every single dollar helps! Please contribute anything you can. This is a great educational and professional opportunity, don't let her pass it up because she can't afford to go!

Thank you in advance!

story:
BANDSTAND DIARIES 

                      THE BOOK YOU'VE WAITED OVER 50 YEARS TO READ!  

Turn back the clock to the late 1950s and early 1960s. You were probably one of the 20 million-plus teenagers and adolescents who rushed home from school to watch the early days of American Bandstand . And, no matter where you lived in the USA, you had a loving connection with the local Philadelphia Regulars who danced on Dick Clark's daily music variety show. 

Remember these familiar names: Arlene and Kenny, Bob and Justine, Pat Molitierri, Frani Giordano, Carole Scaldiferri, Flossie Harvey, Billy Cook, Joe Fusco, Myrna Horowitz, the Jiminez sisters, Harvey Robbins, Janet Hammill, Arlene DiPietro, etc. We have interviewed over 40 of the living legends and pay Tribute to many more who linger in our memory with love in this beautiful coffee-table book, BANDSTAND DIARIES; The Philadelphia Years 1956 to 1963,  which will be published this Summer.


As Bandstand fans, you probably copied the Regulars' fashions, hair styles, dance steps or followed  their latest fads. You eagerly read gossip about them in teen magazines; joined one or more of their personal fan clubs across the country; and mobbed them like movie stars whether they were sipping sodas at Pop Singer’s Luncheonette or appearing at sock hops or concerts.

After American Bandstand  moved to Los Angeles, the Philadelphia Regulars basically faded from daily sight on television, yet our fascination and special memories about them continued until today.

Now, finally, there will be the book that you’ve waited over 50 years to read. It’s called BANDSTAND DIARIES: The Philadelphia Years 1956 to 1963. 

But first, we need each of you who want to own a copy of this to join our pre-publishing campaign.

So here's the scoop...

We are the three authors of BANDSTAND DIARIES

                     Arlene Sullivan: I was a Regular in the mid-1950s. It sometimes seems unbelievable that fans still recognize me after all these years.  My personally written Diary in BANDSTAND DIARIES includes many revealing stories about my life that you didn't read in the teen magazines. "I have been blessed living a very public and, at the same time, private life.  I share both in this wonderful book."


                         Ray Smith: I was an occasional dancer on American Bandstand during its Philadelphia heyday. I also am a co-author of Dick Clark and American Bandstand.  In Bandstand Diaries, "I write about the Bob Horn days, Dick Clark's contributions to pop and cultural history and my own observations watching the show from the bleachers or dancing the occasional jitterbug."

                          Sharon Sultan-Cutler: I was one of those middle school kids who couldn't wait to watch American Bandstand and all the Regulars every afternoon. "I am the lucky Bandstand fan and  co-author who has interviewed over 40 Regulars for this book during the last three years. Sometimes I feel like pinching myself because I feel so blessed to be part of this long-awaited book."

                                            THE IMPACT OF OUR BOOK

The Regulars have done their share to transform American Pop and Cultural history between the late 1950s and early 1960s. As television’s first reality stars, they shaped the way teenagers were portrayed from questionable to respectable.They danced their way into our hearts, minds and living rooms and made rock 'n' roll mainstream. The Regulars could make or break a record during the Rate a Record Segment. No matter what they did, whatever they did  mattered to  us fans who grew up alongside these teenagers through the black-and-white television screen.

Although the niche audience for BANDSTAND DIARIES has grown up into our baby boomer and senior years, this coffee-table book will serve as a historical and cultural reminder of life in the  mid-20th century for readers of all ages. 

It is truly the book millions of fans have been waiting over 50 years to read! 


     HERE IS WHAT WE NEED

Our BANDSTAND DIARIES Indiegogo Crowdfunding Campaign is creating a community of fans like you  who are helping us to professionally publish this once-in-a-lifetime book. Your support shows that you care about keeping those special memories alive just as we do. 

And as many of you already know, we've been researching and writing this book (as well as collecting hundreds of photographs)  for well over three years now. It's our labor- of- love book project which we believe thousands of you will want to have in your library of books. We certainly hope so.

For many of you, this will be your first Crowdfunding Campaign. However, there have already been  thousands of projects including books, movies, products and services that have been completed or financed through the backing and beliefs of Crowdfunding participants like you. Just ask your kids or grand kids who are Millenials or from Generations X or Y!

Our initial goal  is to raise  $20,000  through this 30-day Campaign, solely to pay the upfront costs of designing, editing and printing this full color coffee-table book. That basically means we only need around 600 books pre-ordered.  We believe we all can meet that goal in a matter of days with your support and encouragement. 

The co-authors hope you will also spread the word within your own social media pages (Facebook, Twitter,etc.) plus emailing a note to Bandstand fans who would benefit from knowing about the Campaign. 

There will also be a Banner which you can share to link friends up directly with the campaign.

Our Project Manager, Sharon Woodhouse, has provided us with the following estimated  budget for BANDSTAND DIARIES.

Our Editorial Team (Copyeditor, Proofreader, Indexer)  $3000

Our Design Team (Cover, Interior, Photo Adjuster)  $3,300

Printing    $9,000

Project Manager & Crowdfunding Specialists    $2000

ISBN #s    $250  (necessary for libraries, bookstores, etc.)

Legal & Accounting     $1,500

Website     $1,500

Once that goal is met, BANDSTAND DIARIES becomes a reality and it will be published by mid-Summer.

After we reach our goal during the campaign, the authors will use additional funding to print more books, hire additional staff to help pay for social media, publicity, shipping fees, and fulfillment to ship the books to our readers. All your Crowdfunding contributions reward money will go right back into the publishing and promotion process itself. And we all know that budgets can change at any moment.

We will keep you posted on our Campaign progress  through our Facebook page posts, Tweets on Twitter, and our website blog at www.BandstandDiaries.com . After all, we're all in this together.


         HERE IS HOW YOU CAN HELP

We call our most popular backer reward The Jitterbug. It is the Collectors’ Limited Edition copy of BANDSTAND DIARIES, autographed by Arlene Sullivan. It retails for $35 and is available only during our 30-day Indiegogo Campaign.

How would you like your name to be featured in the book itself?  When you sign up in the next few days, we'll be glad to have your name listed as a Contributor to BANDSTAND DIARIES.  That Perk usually comes at the $100 Reward Level (a three-pack), but we want as many of you as possible to take early advantage of our Campaign. And who doesn't want to see their names in light?

After the 30-day Campaign is completed, we will be selling the second edition in the future. It's the same exact book, but it won't be the Collectors' Limited Edition.


             
                            FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTION AT ANY LEVEL
The co-authors of BANDSTAND DIARIES  want everyone who loved American Bandstand to become part of our Campaign.  Each of you who contributes any amount of $5 and up will be featured in our www.BandstandDiaries.com Fan Page.  You will just send us your Bandstand experience or memory, your name, hometown and Facebook photo (optional) and we will post it on our Fan Page for the world to see. And we're hoping to see many familiar Bandstand fans' memories gracing our Fan Page.

Each of you who becomes a Contributor at $100 up gets to appear in the Big Book, itself.  BANDSTAND DIARIES will have a special section in the back end listing everyone of you who orders 3 or more books!


                              The Ultimate Prize for the $10,000 Big Reward...

You get to become a super-Regular as you're the  co-host of our luxurious catered Bandstand Diaries Book Launch Party in Philadelphia along with Arlene Sullivan, Ray Smith and Sharon Sultan Cutler. This will be an Invitation-only event and we hope many of the Regulars will join all of us, plus some soon-to-be-named celebrity guests, and you and your significant other(s) at this evening. There are more details for the recipient of this ultimate reward when you read about the Perks.

                OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

  • Help get the word out and make some rock 'n' roll noise about our campaign.       If your friends loved American Bandstand  use the Indiegogo share tools at the bottom of the page to keep spreading the word! 
  • If your friends aren't computer-savvy, have them contact us at bandstanddiaries@gmail.com, (including their contact information) and we'll tell them how to join this project or donate offline.
  • Send Bandstand fans to our website News section at www.BandstandDiaries.com or our Facebook.com/BandstandDiaries page to read about the campaign, etc.
  • You can "Share" the Banner we've created on your Facebook page or send it out to a bunch of friends and family by email.
  • Please note that you will also be able to pay via Pay Pal. This will be available in a few days we we just started the process.
story_txt:
BANDSTAND DIARIES                       THE BOOK YOU'VE WAITED OVER 50 YEARS TO READ!  Turn back the clock to the late 1950s and early 1960s. You were probably one of the 20 million-plus teenagers and adolescents who rushed home from school to watch the early days of American Bandstand . And, no matter where you lived in the USA, you had a loving connection with the local Philadelphia Regulars who danced on Dick Clark's daily music variety show. Remember these familiar names: Arlene and Kenny, Bob and Justine, Pat Molitierri, Frani Giordano, Carole Scaldiferri, Flossie Harvey, Billy Cook, Joe Fusco, Myrna Horowitz, the Jiminez sisters, Harvey Robbins, Janet Hammill, Arlene DiPietro, etc. We have interviewed over 40 of the living legends and pay Tribute to many more who linger in our memory with love in this beautiful coffee-table book, BANDSTAND DIARIES; The Philadelphia Years 1956 to 1963,  which will be published this Summer.As Bandstand fans, you probably copied the Regulars' fashions, hair styles, dance steps or followed  their latest fads. You eagerly read gossip about them in teen magazines; joined one or more of their personal fan clubs across the country; and mobbed them like movie stars whether they were sipping sodas at Pop Singer’s Luncheonette or appearing at sock hops or concerts.After American Bandstand  moved to Los Angeles, the Philadelphia Regulars basically faded from daily sight on television, yet our fascination and special memories about them continued until today.Now, finally, there will be the book that you’ve waited over 50 years to read. It’s called BANDSTAND DIARIES: The Philadelphia Years 1956 to 1963. But first, we need each of you who want to own a copy of this to join our pre-publishing campaign.So here's the scoop...We are the three authors of BANDSTAND DIARIES                     Arlene Sullivan: I was a Regular in the mid-1950s. It sometimes seems unbelievable that fans still recognize me after all these years.  My personally written Diary in BANDSTAND DIARIES includes many revealing stories about my life that you didn't read in the teen magazines. "I have been blessed living a very public and, at the same time, private life.  I share both in this wonderful book."                         Ray Smith: I was an occasional dancer on American Bandstand during its Philadelphia heyday. I also am a co-author of Dick Clark and American Bandstand.  In Bandstand Diaries, "I write about the Bob Horn days, Dick Clark's contributions to pop and cultural history and my own observations watching the show from the bleachers or dancing the occasional jitterbug."                          Sharon Sultan-Cutler: I was one of those middle school kids who couldn't wait to watch American Bandstand and all the Regulars every afternoon. "I am the lucky Bandstand fan and  co-author who has interviewed over 40 Regulars for this book during the last three years. Sometimes I feel like pinching myself because I feel so blessed to be part of this long-awaited book."                                            THE IMPACT OF OUR BOOKThe Regulars have done their share to transform American Pop and Cultural history between the late 1950s and early 1960s. As television’s first reality stars, they shaped the way teenagers were portrayed from questionable to respectable.They danced their way into our hearts, minds and living rooms and made rock 'n' roll mainstream. The Regulars could make or break a record during the Rate a Record Segment. No matter what they did, whatever they did  mattered to  us fans who grew up alongside these teenagers through the black-and-white television screen.Although the niche audience for BANDSTAND DIARIES has grown up into our baby boomer and senior years, this coffee-table book will serve as a historical and cultural reminder of life in the  mid-20th century for readers of all ages. It is truly the book millions of fans have been waiting over 50 years to read!      HERE IS WHAT WE NEEDOur BANDSTAND DIARIES Indiegogo Crowdfunding Campaign is creating a community of fans like you  who are helping us to professionally publish this once-in-a-lifetime book. Your support shows that you care about keeping those special memories alive just as we do. And as many of you already know, we've been researching and writing this book (as well as collecting hundreds of photographs)  for well over three years now. It's our labor- of- love book project which we believe thousands of you will want to have in your library of books. We certainly hope so.For many of you, this will be your first Crowdfunding Campaign. However, there have already been  thousands of projects including books, movies, products and services that have been completed or financed through the backing and beliefs of Crowdfunding participants like you. Just ask your kids or grand kids who are Millenials or from Generations X or Y!Our initial goal  is to raise  $20,000  through this 30-day Campaign, solely to pay the upfront costs of designing, editing and printing this full color coffee-table book. That basically means we only need around 600 books pre-ordered.  We believe we all can meet that goal in a matter of days with your support and encouragement. The co-authors hope you will also spread the word within your own social media pages (Facebook, Twitter,etc.) plus emailing a note to Bandstand fans who would benefit from knowing about the Campaign. There will also be a Banner which you can share to link friends up directly with the campaign.Our Project Manager, Sharon Woodhouse, has provided us with the following estimated  budget for BANDSTAND DIARIES.Our Editorial Team (Copyeditor, Proofreader, Indexer)  $3000Our Design Team (Cover, Interior, Photo Adjuster)  $3,300Printing    $9,000Project Manager & Crowdfunding Specialists    $2000ISBN #s    $250  (necessary for libraries, bookstores, etc.)Legal & Accounting     $1,500Website     $1,500Once that goal is met, BANDSTAND DIARIES becomes a reality and it will be published by mid-Summer.After we reach our goal during the campaign, the authors will use additional funding to print more books, hire additional staff to help pay for social media, publicity, shipping fees, and fulfillment to ship the books to our readers. All your Crowdfunding contributions reward money will go right back into the publishing and promotion process itself. And we all know that budgets can change at any moment.We will keep you posted on our Campaign progress  through our Facebook page posts, Tweets on Twitter, and our website blog at www.BandstandDiaries.com . After all, we're all in this together.         HERE IS HOW YOU CAN HELPWe call our most popular backer reward The Jitterbug. It is the Collectors’ Limited Edition copy of BANDSTAND DIARIES, autographed by Arlene Sullivan. It retails for $35 and is available only during our 30-day Indiegogo Campaign.How would you like your name to be featured in the book itself?  When you sign up in the next few days, we'll be glad to have your name listed as a Contributor to BANDSTAND DIARIES.  That Perk usually comes at the $100 Reward Level (a three-pack), but we want as many of you as possible to take early advantage of our Campaign. And who doesn't want to see their names in light?After the 30-day Campaign is completed, we will be selling the second edition in the future. It's the same exact book, but it won't be the Collectors' Limited Edition.                                         FOR YOUR CONTRIBUTION AT ANY LEVEL
The co-authors of BANDSTAND DIARIES  want everyone who loved American Bandstand to become part of our Campaign.  Each of you who contributes any amount of $5 and up will be featured in our www.BandstandDiaries.com Fan Page.  You will just send us your Bandstand experience or memory, your name, hometown and Facebook photo (optional) and we will post it on our Fan Page for the world to see. And we're hoping to see many familiar Bandstand fans' memories gracing our Fan Page.
Each of you who becomes a Contributor at $100 up gets to appear in the Big Book, itself.  BANDSTAND DIARIES will have a special section in the back end listing everyone of you who orders 3 or more books!
                              The Ultimate Prize for the $10,000 Big Reward...
You get to become a super-Regular as you're the  co-host of our luxurious catered Bandstand Diaries Book Launch Party in Philadelphia along with Arlene Sullivan, Ray Smith and Sharon Sultan Cutler. This will be an Invitation-only event and we hope many of the Regulars will join all of us, plus some soon-to-be-named celebrity guests, and you and your significant other(s) at this evening. There are more details for the recipient of this ultimate reward when you read about the Perks.
                OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Help get the word out and make some rock 'n' roll noise about our campaign.       If your friends loved American Bandstand  use the Indiegogo share tools at the bottom of the page to keep spreading the word! 


If your friends aren't computer-savvy, have them contact us at bandstanddiaries@gmail.com, (including their contact information) and we'll tell them how to join this project or donate offline.
Send Bandstand fans to our website News section at www.BandstandDiaries.com or our Facebook.com/BandstandDiaries page to read about the campaign, etc.
You can "Share" the Banner we've created on your Facebook page or send it out to a bunch of friends and family by email.
Please note that you will also be able to pay via Pay Pal. This will be available in a few days we we just started the process.

story:
NipPop: Parole e Forme da Tokyo a Bologna è un progetto, pensato e coordinato dai docenti e dagli studenti di Lingua e Letteratura Giapponese dell'Ateneo di Bologna, con la collaborazione e partecipazione di artisti ed esperti italiani e stranieri, che prevede una serie di eventi – workshop, proiezioni, conferenze, musica – culminanti nell’omonima manifestazione annuale, che nel 2014 giunge alla sua quarta edizione. 

Diventato ufficialmente marchio registrato e associazione culturale, NipPop si pone l’obiettivo di promuovere la cultura giapponese contemporanea attraverso l’analisi delle tendenze pop attuali, con particolare riguardo ad ambiti quali animazione, manga, cinema, arte, televisione, musica e letteratura. Il progetto vuole anche rappresentare un’occasione per un contatto più vivo fra l'Ateneo e la città, valorizzando le possibilità di interazione con il territorio, con la comunità giapponese a Bologna e con le associazioni culturali locali da tempo impegnate nella promozione della cultura del Sol Levante.

L'edizione di quest'anno avrà l'onore di ospitare tantissimi artisti e studiosi internazionali tra i quali: Ichiguchi Keiko, Tagame Gengoroh, Ian Condry, Morikawa Kaichirō, Liza E. Anzen, Federica Di Meo e tanti altri (anche in base al vostro supporto!).



NipPop: Words and Forms from Tokyo to Bologna is an annual project created and developed by the Japanese Language and Literature teaching staff of the School of Languages and Literatures, Translation and Interpreting of the University of Bologna, that in 2014 is reaching its fourth edition. The event, composed by a series of talks and workshops that include the participation of internationally well-known scholars, professionals and artists, aims to promote contemporary Japanese culture through the analysis of phenomena such as animation, manga, cinema, art, music, and literature. NipPop represents also the opportunity to establish a more lively interaction between the University and the city, appraising a significant interplay with the Japanese community that resides in the area of Bologna, together with the cultural associations committed in the promotion and diffusion of Japanese culture.

For this fourth edition we are really proud to host international artist and lecturers as: Ichiguchi Keiko, Tagame Gengoroh, Ian Condry, Morikawa Kaichirō, Liza E. Anzen, Federica Di Meo and many more (it will depend on your contributions!).


Supporta NipPop 2014!!!

Con un contributo, per quanto piccolo, supporterete l'associazione a rendere l'evento NipPop 2014 ancora più dinamico e interessante, permettendoci di utilizzare location sempre più belle e spaziose che accoglieranno ospiti, workshop e tavole rotonde. Ogni donazione aiuterà, ad esempio, ad acquistare i biglietti di viaggio per gli ospiti internazionali che parteciperanno all'evento, oppure, a prolungare l'utilizzo del Cinema Nosadella, dove abbiamo in programma diversi incontri.
NipPop 2014 è un progetto che cresce di anno in anno proprio grazie al supporto di volontari e appassionati, interessati a renderlo sempre più grande.
Attraverso la nostra pagina Facebook e Twitter avete la possibilità di influire anche sullo sviluppo del lavoro, attraverso suggerimenti o critiche, in una ricerca collettiva e partecipata.

Give a hand to NipPop 2014!!!

With only a little financial help, you can support the association and make this fourth edition of NipPop even more interesting and funny, allowing us to rent wider and beautiful locations that will host international guests, workshops and roundtables. For example, each donation will aid to buy flight tickets for our foreign lecturers (or artists), or just to extend the use of Nosadella theater, where we are planning to set various roundtables. NipPop 2014 is a project that grows each year bigger and bigger thanks to volunteers and passion-driven people, which enjoy all the scheduled activities. Via our Facebook and Twitter pages, you will have the possibility to help us improving and affecting our project through suggestions and critics, in a collective and involving research.



A cosa servirà il tuo contributo?

  • Contribuirà al 80% dell’affitto del Cinema Nosadella.
    Useremo questo spazio per ospitare diverse tavole rotonde dove si incontreranno e confronteranno diversi editori italiani, traduttori e altri agenti che operano nel settore del manga.
  • Contribuirà al 50% sull'organizzazione dell'intrattenimento che verrà effettuato durante i due giorni in programma al Giardino Pierfrancesco Lo Russo presso il Quartiere Porto.
  • Contribuirà al 50% dei costi di comunicazione.
    Comunicare l’evento è un'azione fondamentale per far crescere NipPop e sostenendoci potremo stampare, ad esempio, materiale di qualità superiore e, insomma, tutto quello che serve per far si che l'evento abbia una eco a Bologna, in Italia e nel Web sempre maggiore.
  • Contribuirà al 50% delle spese di allestimento tecnico.


In which way the contribute will be spent?

  • At around 80% it will contribute to the rental fee of Nosadella movie theater.
    We are planning to use this nice place as host place for various roundtables, where italian editors, translators and other agents working in the manga sector will meet and discuss.
  • At 50% it will contribute to the entertainment organization costs which will be performed during the event on the last two days at the Giardino Pierfrancesco Lo Russo inside Quartiere Porto.
  • At 50% it will contribute to the Communication and Web media management.
    One of the most important elements that allows NipPop to grow bigger and bigger each year is the possibility to mantain a high level in Communication and Web contents.Your support will allow us to produce, for example, better informative goods and all that we need to promote NipPop over Bologna, Italy and the Internet.
  • Last but not least, at 50% it will contribute to the technical service, during the event.


Come funziona?

Non potrebbe essere più facile. Si può pagare con carta di credito/carta di debito o PayPal. Basta cliccare sui banner di fianco al video con scritto CONTRIBUTE NOW e scegliere la donazione con cui vorreste supportare l'associazione NipPop e noi, a fine campagna Indiegogo, vi spediremo il premio corrispondente. Potete anche scrivere una cifra diversa da quelle indicate e non richiedere alcun perk. E' possibile anche effettuare una donazione anonima.


How does it work?

It is really simple. You can donate with credit card or through your PayPal account. You just have to click our CONTRIBUTE NOW banner on the right part of the page, and choose one of the PERKS with their corresponding rewards. At the end of the Indiegogo campaign, we will send you your perk via mail. Furthermore, you could donate a different amount and you will be able to donate in anonymous way.



Cosa succede una volta scaduto il tempo della campagna Indiegogo?

La cifra indicata è quella che ci permetterà l'organizzazione completa di NipPop. Se alla scadenza la cifra fosse superata, l'importo in eccedenza verrà investito in un ulteriore miglioramento di quest'evento. Se invece, alla scadenza, non dovessimo raggiungere la somma prefissata, utilizzeremo le donazioni per supportare al massimo l'organizzazione dell'edizione di quest'anno.


What will happen when the Indiegogo campaign's deadline ends?

The set goal amount is what will allow us to fully organize the NipPop 2014 event. Should we go beyond the goal, all of the exceeding amount will be spent to further improve the activities and the organization works. On the other hand, if the date will expire without letting us to fully reach the goal amount, we will entirely spend all the earned amount to organize the event as better as we can.


Come contattarci:

How to conctact us:

Sito ufficiale / Official site: www.nippop.it

Facebook: www.facebook.com/nippopbologna

Youtube: www.youtube.com/nippopbologna

Twitter: www.twitter.com/NipPopOfficial

Email: info@nippop.it

story:
Project Details & Itinerary

The question that seemed most universal is what (or who) inspires an individual to continue pursuing their goals and dreams. If they are not in pursuit of their dreams or goals, what drives them to get up each day and face lifes challenges.

Although the question seems straight forward, the answers are quite profound when coupled with each persons experience to make it to the particular point in life where they intersect with Meka & Ty.

Meka & Ty are actively traveling, volunteering, and interviewing people as you read this profile.

Their itenarary includes travel through the following states, with volunteering assignments in the states with an asterisk (*):

  • California
  • Arizona*
  • New Mexico
  • Texas*
  • Louisiana
  • Mississippi
  • Alabama
  • Georgia*
  • South Carolina
  • North Carolina
  • Virginia
  • Maryland*
  • Pennsylvania
  • New Jersey
  • New York


Meka & Ty have volunteer opportunities with several different organizations across the nation. The assignments allow them to fulfill their passion for helping others.

 

You can stay up to date on their location and adventures online at http://www.america-inspired.com and via Facebook and Instagram.

What Is Needed & Why

All of Meka & Ty's resources have been depleted making it from California to New York and back. They are staying with family, friends, and aquaintences to make the trip affordable. They need help with resources for the publication of the phenominal stories they've collected, and distribution of the book, which include:

  • Editing
  • Book Cover Graphics
  • Publishing
  • Marketing
  • Soundtrack
  • Distribution
  • and More

The Impact

There are millions of stories of people across the United States that are inspiriational and can strengthen others in their journey. It's difficult to imagine that someone across the country could be experiencing similar experiences but it's true. There can be insights and gems to gleen from knowing the details.

It can be empowering to know you're not alone in your journey with either making mistakes and working to create a better life, or making all the right moves and thriving.

Our tapestry of stories make us a stronger and a better nation, and they look forward to bringing those stories to you!


Other Ways You Can Help

The gals are out on the road roughing it and sleeping with family, friends, and aquaintances to save funds. 

If you would like to help with gas or incidentals during their trip, you can provide immediate support to them via paypal by sending funds to americainspired @ gmail .com
story_txt:
Project Details & Itinerary

The question that seemed most universal is what (or who) inspires an individual to continue pursuing their goals and dreams. If they are not in pursuit of their dreams or goals, what drives them to get up each day and face lifes challenges.Although the question seems straight forward, the answers are quite profound when coupled with each persons experience to make it to the particular point in life where they intersect with Meka & Ty.Meka & Ty are actively traveling, volunteering, and interviewing people as you read this profile.Their itenarary includes travel through the following states, with volunteering assignments in the states with an asterisk (*):

story:
A kid's adventure book targeted to fantasy superhero parents who love to role play, miniature war game and have fun with their kids.

"MiniWarGamer" Dave here from MiniWarGaming.com. "Troooolls!" is an adventure book for all ages that was inspired by a real life imaginative role playing game I created for my two kids. Being a gamer of many genres (miniature war gaming, role playing, table top, board games) I'm proud to be a parent who plays fun games with his kids. The drive to create this book came from my desire to show the world that gaming is fun and is a pivotal part of kids' imaginations and positive experience in life.


My objective for this crowdfunding campaign is to raise funds for publication and distribution of this book. I want to see it sold in bookstores across the nation and in the world! I know there are many hobbyist/gamer parents that would love to see their favourite past time represented in a kids book. That's what Troooolls! is. 

The Moral of the Story

It was important to me that elements of the hobbies and games I love were depicted in the book. It gives us gamers something we can relate to our kids and show how much fun our hobbies are. The story starts with me painting miniatures and eating a healthy snack when all of a sudden my kids come running in yelling "Daddy! Troooolls! The trolls are coming Daddy!"

My kids are the most important thing in the world to me so I drop everything (even my beloved hobby) and declare "Onward kids! Let's hide so the trolls won't find us!" 

We then enter Arisnona the Troll world where we learn to accept the differences of others and make unexpected friends. We learn that even though things may be scary at first, if we're brave enough to be the first to extend the hand of friendship, the world becomes a different place.


Dice will be thrown, dangerous terrain tests will be passed, allies will be formed, enemies will be challenged, hearts will be softened, paint pots will fly, luck will prevail, adventure will ensue and experience will be awarded.

The morals taught in "Troooolls!" are many. Value of friendship, loyalty, accepting the differences of others, bravery in times of trial, honesty with oneself,  trust and just an overall feeling of loving life and having fun with it. That's the feeling I wish to convey when one reads it. 

I want to show the world that we hobbyist/gamer parents are superheroes! That we are the parents of the kids to which their friends say "I wish my dad was as cool as that" or "Your mom is fun and awesome!" We play these games and we love it! It's so much more productive than many of the other types of recreational activities our kids could be into. It's a great way to spend time with our kids and I feel reading books to them, especially fun books with good morals taught fall under this category. 


Pledge Levels

 This first pledge level gets you a prefect bound paper back edition of Troooolls! printed on silk text paper with a 10 pt C1S with high gloss UV coating cover. Bascially what that means is the cover will be durable enough to withstand kids throwing it around if it should happen. 

The 2nd pledge level gets you a signed copy of Troooolls! plus a downloadable PDF for those who like to view books using their iPads, Tablets, Kindles, Kobos, iPhones and other devices. 

The 3rd pledge level is the Ultimate Troooolls! Bundle. (If the Stretch Goal is hit then all who get the Ultimate Troooolls! Bundle will also get a signed copy of Oooorcs!) You get a copy of Troooolls! with the downloadable PDF. In addition, the book is not only signed but has a personalized message written to you or to whomever you specify. This bundle also features the interactive DVD which includes the interactive Read-Along-Video, behind the scenes, The Making of Troooolls! featurette, original concept art gallery & more! And lastly you'll get the audio book of Troooolls! as a downloadable mp3. 


Click here for a sample from the audio book: http://miniwargaming.s3.amazonaws.com/TroooollsAudioBook.mp3

In addition the the final audio book of "Troooolls!" voiced by Dave, as per popular demand an alternate version of the audiobook will be narrated by his dad "PAPA SMURF!" 

This next pledge level makes you a lifetime vault member at the SILVER level as well as everything listed above in the ultimate "Troooolls!" bundle. If you enjoy watching videos on MiniWarGaming.com and have always wanted to be a vault member, now's the time to take advantage of this offer. If you're an existing vault member, it's an even bigger reason to grab this deal! Lifetime vault memberships are rare and aren't regularly offered. Included as part of this pledge level are all the DVD digital downloads that have been created in the MiniWarGaming vault. 

The lifetime GOLD vault membership pledge level gives you everything in the ultimate "Troooolls!" bundle and everything the lifetime silver gives you. In addition to this, the lifetime gold vault membership gives you at 10% discount when you shop at the thewarstore.com, 

 Now we get to the fun area of this campaign. A place where magic happens are absolute craziness ensues. This next pledge level gives you everything listed above and...this is a big one folks...a troll in the book is named after you. How cool would it be to read this to your kids now? Or to give to your nieces and nephews? How would you like to say "check out this sweet kids book. I'm a troll in it!" There're only 5 spots to fill to act fast before you miss your chance at being immortalized as a troll in the land of Arisnona. 

The pledge level below also gets you the Ultimate "Troooolls!" bundle and the lifetime gold vault membership.

The Red Dragon is a kind, wise, friendly dragon who helps us when we're in trouble. He is also nameless right now and feels bad that nobody knows his true name :( He is smart, clever and always knows the best way to solve a problem. The Red Dragon perk also gets you the Ultimate "Troooolls!" bundle and the lifetime gold vault membership.

Now the for pledge level for a special person who loves the spotlight. The Ice Wizard is the main bad guy in "Troooolls!" and will be ingrained in the imaginations of kids for years to come.



About us

Dave Nordquist (aka MiniWarGamer Dave) the co-owner of MiniWarGaming.com - Author of "Troooolls!"

http://www.miniwargaming.com/

Clayton Tait - Illustrator of "Troooolls!"

http://taytonclait.deviantart.com/

story:
Somos un grupo de voluntarios particulares y anónimos, de diversos grupos- o de ninguno, que se ha reunido en este sector para trabajar e iniciar la reconstrucción de manera inmediata tras el incendio del pasado 13 de abril.

El objetivo de nuestro proyecto consiste en construir al menos 9 viviendas, para familias del “Pasaje Los Buenos Vecinos”. Estas construcciones contarán con la estructura siguiente: Cabañas de 6 x 3 mts (media agua) montadas sobre pilotes; base de piso en pino de 2x3 ; piso de terciado de 15mm, paneles de pared de 2x2, techo de zinc, interior Volcanita, exterior Permanit, ventanas y puertas.

Hasta ahora, hemos contado con algunas donaciones y aportes materiales de particulares así como con el apoyo de centros de acopio, amigos y vecinos para armar los paneles de pared, nivelar los terrenos, instalar e impermeabilizar los pilotes. Además de instalar baños secos, ayudar con la limpieza general del sitio, acercarse a la comunidad y evaluar las necesidades particulares del momento.

Cabe decir, que el trabajo que se viene es abundante y arduo, pero confiamos en que, con el equipo que se ha constituido “in situ”, la experiencia de sus miembros (trazadores, carpinteros, coordinadores, universitarios, bodegueros, encargados de residuos, y muchos más) su energía y voluntad, podremos lograr nuestro objetivo. Para eso, es imprescindible que sigamos recibiendo aportes para conseguir los materiales de construcción que faltan.

Hemos convocado y nos hemos encontrado con unos 50 voluntarios de Valparaíso, San Antonio, Santiago, Chiloé, Argentina, La Ligua, Canadá, España, etc. que han hecho su aporte de diversas maneras al proyecto; removiendo escombros, limpiando, instalando viviendas temporales con materiales reciclados, preparando y nivelando los terrenos, coordinando, informándose e informando al vecindario, consiguiendo materiales y aportes financieros, etc.

Al enfocar nuestra energía en un sector determinado del desastre, sentimos que podemos hacer una diferencia significativa en las condiciones de vida de esas personas y familias al proveerlas con una vivienda que les permita estar protegidos del invierno que se acerca.

Cabe insistir en que nosotros no pertenecemos a ninguna institución, grupo u organización. Somos anónimos, anónimos que se han unido ante la catástrofe porque no han podido ni han querido quedarse de brazos cruzados. Individuos que han decidido tomar la pala, el hacha y el chuzo para ayudar, aunque sea un poco, a la gente de los cerros de este puerto querido.

Las donaciones obtenidas serán destinadas a comprar los materiales que nos faltan: techos, revestimientos interiores y exteriores, ventanas, puertas y suelos.

Para aquellos que no puedan hacer un aporte económico, pueden ayudarnos corriendo la voz y compartiendo el enlace de este proyecto.

En nombre de todos los que NO ELIJEN DONDE VIVIR, le agradecemos de antemano su generosidad y compromiso con la causa.

story:
Short Summary

  • I'm a 16 year old writer from Illinois.
  • The book is a crime/drama fiction based in New York. 
  • I'm trying to live out my dream of becoming published. 
  • By funding me, you allow me to share my fiction novels with the world

What We Need & What You Get

  • I need a little over $10,000 in total, but I'm trying to raise at least half so I can start hiring editors, hire an illustrator, and pay for all the other small fees that add up to crazy amounts. 
  • I feel as though my project is unique because the book looks at crime/drama from a different angle and has several plot twists and surprises. 
  • If I don't reach my goal, I plan on using the money for an editor and illustrator and hopefully find other ways to earn the rest. 

The Impact

  • Looking from your perspective, you would help people who love to read fiction add another book to read to their list. 
  • I have success in fundraising, like a fundraiser I did for breast cancer and another for the music programs in schools.
  • This is the first fundraiser I have done for my own dreams/needs. 

Risks & Challenges

  • The obstacles are piling up like crazy.
  • 1st obstacle: age and experience; However, due to my writing experience, starting when I was 9, I can show publishers I have the drive and passion. 
  • 2nd obstacle: finding an interested party; currently I'm constantly searching for someone with interest and with your help I will push through the wall and find the interest. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you can't donate money, you can still help me greatly by advertising the campaign to everyone you can. 
  • Share to Facebook, Twitter, Instagram... Tell your Friends and Family... Post it on the Internet and share it on other websites.
  •  Also, I am having an event on November 26th, the day before Thanksgiving, which all of you are welcome to attend. Feel free to contact me in order to get the event details. 

Thank you for your help and I look towards the future and completing my goal.

story:
Short Summary

  • During three years of research and two years of editing, conducted mainly in Romania, France, and Poland, I explored the history of European Yiddish theatre. While this theatre tradition is rather young at less than 150 years old, it is extraordinarily rich and diverse, spanning both sides of the Atlantic. My book is about the contemporary Yiddish theatre in Europe on historical background and was supposed to be published in July 2014 but the Polish Government gave me only half of the grant, this is simply not enough.
  • My publisher, Professor Janusz Degler from The University of Wroclaw, wants me to find remaining $2500 and he extended the deadline to February 24 to raise the money in order to start the publishing process. Otherwise the Polish Government won't support the project and I won't be able to publish my book, which I've spent five years working on.

What We Need & What You Get

  • The $2500 I raise will go to the publishing process for my book. If I don't reach my entire goal, the book will NEVER be published. None of the money I ask for goes to my pocket.
  • If you donate $10, I'll teach you a Yiddish curse word that you'll NEVER FORGET!
  • If you donate $25, I'll give you a one-hour virtual Yiddish class, teaching the basics of Yiddish, not only will you be able to curse in Yiddish but you can also tell jokes in Yiddish and talk to your old grandma.
  • If you donate $100, I'll give you up to 3 hours of Yiddish lessons plus a Yiddish CD of my favorite Yiddish classics.
  • If you donate $500, I'll not only give you up to five hours of Yiddish lessons but also inscribe your name in my book, personally thanking you for your support. I'll also send you the book before it's released!
  • If you donate $1000 or more, I will dedicate my book to you, provide you with countless Yiddish lessons, give you copies of all my favorite Yiddish songs plus I'll give you a copy of my book, personally autographed by me.

The Impact

The big question of my book is to see if Yiddish-language theatre is still visible in Europe beyond the deep depths of archives. Furthermore, I wanted to find out if the current state of Yiddish theatre in Europe could be said to be genuine or if, perhaps, it was just virtual. The project is above all aimed at answering the question of whether or not it makes any sense to have an active Yiddish theatre today. I also explore other issues relating to the role of contemporary Yiddish theatre in modern Europe and its potential future. 

During my research, I had an opportunity to get familiar with several generations of Yiddish theatre artists, both through archival research, as well as through interviews with contemporary actors, poets, and directors. The people I interviewed seemed very touched by being able to speak in Yiddish about Yiddish theatre with a young person. My journey was highly emotional and fruitful. The topic may not be very popular, but without doubt it is worth exploring.

In my book, I focused on the works of the theatres which still perform in Yiddish (for example: Jewish State Theatre of Bucharest, Jewish State Theatre of Warsaw, LufTheatre in Strasbourg, and Troïm Theatre in Paris). I analyzed their work carefully and I came to the conclusion, that Yiddish theatre as a form of art might have some chance of future development, although, because of its “virtual” shape, it will be completely different that before March 1986. It will also remain, most likely, a part of off-off culture and never reach the main stream theatre. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you don't have any money but you are funny, then pass this along to all your friends and family! I really need all the help I can get and your grandma would be proud of you if you can help me.
